1b1(1): @##/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma hA ba ri nar+b+bA NaM nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo// dam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
1b2(1): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rtswa mchog gi grong khyer skyes bu stobs po che 'byung ba'i gnas klung ha ri la ba de'i 'gram shing sA la drung
1b3(1): gnyis kyi bar na/ dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rnyed kyis yongs su bskor nas/ mdun du bdar thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpyid zla 'bring po'i
1b4(1): chos bcosa'i nyin par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nye ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gsung chen pos srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du kun tu khyab par sems can thams cad
1b5(1): so so'i skad du gsung 'di skad ces grags par gyur te// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye bo mang po rnams la thugs brtse ba/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs
1b6(1): dang mgon du gyur pa/ sems can thams cad sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar mnyam par gzigs pa/ sems can gyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / rten dang / gnas su gyur pa dang yo
1b7(1): su mya ngan las 'da'o// so so'i skye bo dag the tshom dang som nyir gyur pa yod na/ da zhu zhing dri ba'i dus nang gi tha ma 'dir zhu zhing gsol cig ces pa'i gsung gis yongs su grags par gyur to// 
1b8(1): deni tshe bcom ldan 'das sna dro'i dus kyi tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od rnam pa sna tshogs bkye ba ni 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / shel lta bus stong gsum gyi
1b9(1): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du yongs su snang bar byas nas/ de dag na gnas pa'i lam rgyud drug gi sems can dag
1b10(1): dod zer dri reg ma thag ma tu kha na ma tho ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar gyur to// de'i tshe so so'i skye bo dag de lta bu'i lhas mthong zhing thos nas mya ngan chen pos yid gdungs te/ dus
2a1(1): gcig tu cho nges rdung zhing ngus nas 'di skad du/ e ma'o shin tu byams pa'i la mar gyur pa/ kyi hud kyi drung mya ngan las 'das samu zhes smras nas thal mos mgo dang bram
2a2(1): la rdebs te cho nge rdung ngo // kha cig ni lus kyang rab tu 'dar zhing ba spu kun langs nas skad kyis brnangs pa tsam du ngus so// de'i tshe na sa chen po 'di dang / ri dang rgya mtsho 'ang rab tu g.yos shing
2a3(1): 'khrugs so// de nas sems can de dag gcig la gcig spro bsring zhing mya ngan bsang ba'i phyir 'di skad du/ kye grogs dag mya ngan ma byed par myur du rtswa mchog gi grong khyer skyes bu stobs po che 'byung ba'i gnas
2a4(1): de bzhin gshegs pa kal ba der 'dong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten ni bskal pa gcig gam
2a5(1): bskal pa gcig 'gribs kyi bar du bzhugs par gsol du 'deng ngo zhes smras so// la la ni gcig gi lag pa la gcig gis 'jus nas 'di skad du 'jig rten stongs te/ sems can gyi bsod nam
2a6(1): zad pas mi dge ba'i las 'jig rten du byung bar gyur gyis/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs nges kyis bdag cag
2a7(1): myur du 'deng ngo zhes smra'o// la la ni 'di skad du 'jig rten stongs so// 'jig rten stongs so// bdag cag la dang slan chad ni mgon dang skyabs med de/ dbul phongs par gyur to// 
2a8(1): deng kho nar bla na med pa'i bcom ldan 'das dang yongs su bral bas de slan chad som nyi dang the tshom za ba sul zhu zhes smra'o// de'i tshe na tshad med pa'i nye gnas chen po che dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po dang / 
2a9(1): tshe dang ldan bku la dang / tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo la sogs pa dge slong chen po de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg pas lus kun 'dar zhing mi bzod pa tsam du rab tu g.yos te/ sems
2b1(1): kyang myos nas chong 'debs shing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis non par gyur to// de'i tshe gzhan yang dge slong ba rgya stong phrag brgyad cu snyed thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ sem
2b2(1): kyi dbang du gyur pa/ bya ba byas pa/ nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa/ dbang po thams cad rab tu dul ba/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar mthu che ba/ stong pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ phyis
2b3(1): bdag gi don rab tu rnyed pa/ tsan+dan gyi tsha la ltar tsan+dan gyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge'i rgyal po ltar seng ges yongs su bskor ba/ de lta bu'i tshad med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyang sangs
2b4(1): rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa sha stag go/ de dag kyang snga dro nyi ma sher ma thag tu gnas nas byung ste/ so shing 'cha' ba na sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du grogs po dag myur du kha
2b5(1): lag khrus shis ces smraso// de skad ces smras ma thag tu lus kyi ba spu kun langs nas/ lus la khyab par khrag rgyas pa ni me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur te/ mig mchi mas gang nas sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur
2b6(1): 'di da ga thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la len pa dang bde bzhi don gyi phyir/ theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas thab su dgongs te/ gsungs
2b7(1): dag bstan pa'i phyir/ rnaM ba sna tshogasu chos ston pa rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad yongasu gdul ba'i phyir/ bcoM ldan 'dra gang na ba der myur du dong na spyi bos sa byas kyi zhabras phyag btsal te/ yan
2b8(1): stong du bskor na thal mo sbyar te phyog gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang kun+ta la'i bu mo dge slong ma dpal bzang dag dge slong ma bsnyen dga' ma dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho'i blo gros la sogs te/ dge slong ma khri phrag
2b9(1): snyistesnyi tham ca kyang dgra bcom ga zag pa zad pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur pa/ byA ba byAsmra pa/ nyon mong ba yongasu spya pa/ dbang po rab tu dul bu/ klu chen po ltar gzi brjid rab tu che ba/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab dang ldan pa
2b10(1): ga ste/ de dag kyang sde dro'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma thog mar shar ba na/ lus kyis chu klon gyi bung zhes byed nas lus la khyim par khrag gis rgyas pi ni me tig pa la shag bur gyur te/ mig mchi mas yongasu gang cu sdug bsngal chen po
3a1(1): myong bar gyur togasade dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyirade bzhin gshegs
3a2(1): bsabs pa sa te/ bzungs pa dag kun ba'i bye/ nab pa 'chogs su cas kon ternyar gyi mang ba'i byeng / mems ca bam cad yong bsdu chub pa'i byeng / bcom pa 'das pa dri'i
3a3(1): yang sa rgyab kyi rnabasas rgya ba'i phyag 'tsha te/ par brgya stong shong na / bal po kyang te phyogs gcig tu 'thod da/ nga ni thongs de dag gin pan/ dge slong ma la cishi ni byang chub sem sa ya the/  rtsi'i mang du
3a4(1): bu sa bcu rab tu rton pa/ myi g.yol ba la gnas pa/ sems can 'dul ba'i phyir bung byed kyi lus stond kyang / rtag tu tshad myed pa bzhi la nan tan byed pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur nga bas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yang sprusang ban/ 
3a5(1): b+han no// de'i tshe gzhan yang sdug pa 'gal gcig gi bye ba snyed kyi dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya'i nang mthu lta bres bcu rab tu nom pa/ phyi g.yol ba ya pe tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis
3a6(1): rgyas stonang pag thams 'dis ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshol dpas dang / bya bachub sems blo gros kyi 'ang ba las/ bathogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rapa dren zhing dan gyi
3a7(1): thornapa drang banas/ thams cad kyang reg pa chen po sa bkur ba byed pa/ theg pa chen pos rab tu gnas bya/ theg pa chen po sa gnang du mkha' par reg pa chen po bzhin du du thos zed parje
3a8(1): la shi nang tu byung ba/ 'jig rtenang du bcas pa/ thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa/ rnam 'ongs pa'i dus su ma grol 'gros pa sbyi dam 'cha' ba/ 'das pa'i du gams yang ba grangs byed pa'i bar du tshul khrims yongs su bzungs so
3a9(1): nga ba yongs su 'dzing te/ 'grob 'grol bar byed pa/ dkon mtshon gsum gi gdung dru gyi tshong bar tshob pa// mam pa dros bu chos kyi 'thod lab sor dzubab rgyarkyen po zhin tu than pa/ sa 'o / 
3a10(1): 'on yAn bye ba du nga/ sem tham cad 'thun cis 'das rlams pa ga byang tsho stsu 'i mig gas 'ang kyisakyi rnams / sa kya
3a11(1): rgyab 'di/ ji skad mi rtog pa lag lta bur gyur te/ myig mchi' mas yongs su gang nas/ sdug ste'i myong bar byed do// de sa kyang sems can name bang bu phun bya dang bde ba'i phyir/ theg parkyen po do pa'i 'di lhod pa nyid
3b1(1): nal 'byor du 'asgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs su dgongs te/ gsungs pa bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam pa lnga tshogs su chos stonang btsun gyi gcod pa'i phyir/ bams camathas sacang yongs su 'dus pa'i phyir/ 
3b2(1): ldan 'das ga na ba der myu rab tu dong nas phyinang pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan rgya stong du bskor pa byas rten/ thal mo sbyar nas snying thang bcas pas phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // de'i tshe gzhan ya
3b3(1): kruklung gang 'ga' gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi dge la bsnyen pa khrims lnga yongs su srung pa la 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen/ gzi' brjid dri ma myed pa'i grags kha'i rgyal po dang / dge' bsnyen legs pa'i yon tan la sa rtogs pas thog mar drangs
3b4(1): te/ thams cad kyang gnyen por 'gyur ba'i chos la shin du tu mos pa ni 'di lta ste/ sdug sngal dang / ba de la dang / rtag pa dang / byi rtag pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / ma dag pa dang / bdag dang / bdag myed pa dang
3b5(1): nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang / skyabs su myi 'gro ba dang / sems can dang sems can ma yin pa dang / ther zug 'angather zug ma yin pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba ma yin pa dang / 'dus
3b6(1): bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas dang / chang ba dang / chang da ma yin paradang mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin pa dang / skrag pa dang / sreg ma yin pa ga chogs te/ gnyen po brgyad
3b7(1): pa'i chos 'di dag rtog par shi na tu mos pa ba stag kon/ gzhan yang bla na myed pa'i theg pa chen po sa thos par mos pa/ dzi d+ha thos pa bzhin du gzham sa yam ston nus / tshul khrims yongs su drung
3b8(1): theg pa chen po la sgom pas gdungs 'altar mos pa/ bdag kyang shin tu ngongs la/ sgom pas gdungs pa gzhan yang ngoms par byed pa/ bla ma byed pa 'i ye zhes pa shin tu 'jug pa/ theg pa chen po la mos pa/ theg parjen
3b9(1): po bzhin tu srung ba/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi sems dpa ni nang tu spyongs/ ma sbal ba rnams smos pa// ma grol pa rnams 'brel pa/ dkon mchog ga sum gi gdung myi 'chang bar rgyob pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su
3b10(1): chos gi 'khor lo shin tu bskor ba/ brgyan chen pos rnam pa brgyan dpa/ sems zhi nang dram batho 'tshal thos pa/ tshul khrims yongs su ngas ra/ thams cad kyi bangs bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ sims namam/ 
4a1(1): ti mamang sas byed pang thugacig pa dang 'dra ba gnyis su byed par byos pa 'gagyur ro// dengs ca pa dro'i gas ma da ba sems/ de ba'i bshegs da su su
4a2(1): na na sa sa rnamams pa dzang rdzun pa ngas pa yos ngas pa 'i mes/ 
4a3(1): ri pos la rgyu rtsub bangan sa bcu med dang de/ 'du zhedra bas bla re byen po// rin pa che thong nga de me de'i thong yang / don pa de'i gdug sa rdzab cu sbyid stering ri sa du'i chog 'i 'phred
4a4(1): byung ba yin 'das the/ matog spang ba pa dang / me tog ku mu ta dang / martog par mo dang /  ma d+hi ga nams te/ ga sa sa ni gshed/ ge gar ni ri mags byas te/ ma ston na mi ga de'i rgya sa kyang
4b1(1): bcan po rjong zhing chog/ gzhan yang ldan pazhin tu ldanang pa dang / de mayin pa byin pa pa dang / bab+h+ya rnal pa dang /  / bdag byeng da'i 'di 'byin nadesas ge' de yang byang chub me pa'i
4b2(1): sngon phyung ba myong ba'i sgra dang / gzham sang chos mo lnga tshogs kyi snga grags pa ni 'disa.e/ glu dang / gang dang / gling bu dang / dbu po rgyang mangs dang / rtsem+bu dang / shing dang / de'i rnamam pa'o// 
4b3(1): k+Sha de la pa gzhan yang 'di gang du/ kyi phud kyi hud/ 'jig rten stongs so zhes zer ba'i sgra 'byung / shing rta re re ro'i mdu na// dge bsnyen rin po chel ni zho'i khri'u 'ogs pa me yong // tsi'u rdo'u de'i the na
4b4(1): rnam pa tshogs kyis tog zhungs pa ni 'dis/ me tog chung bas dang / ku muta dang // bang po / phrin dngag dang / bur kun dang / rgyan gron dang / gdug sa thos las rdzogam pas ma tu rgyas
4b5(1): phul du gyung da pa/ rnams bshams so// dge stend rnams kyis sangs da rgyas dang / dge 'dun la 'bod snyoms rnam pa sna tshogs ba shams pa yang thams cad tsan dan dang / a ga tsu'i zhing srung can sregs
4b6(1): yon tan brgyang dab ldan pa'i tshul yos su byab 'o// pas de dag kyang do rnam ba drug dang ldaldan// 'jig sa// khab dang / byung ba dang / dang pa dang / chub dang / lan \u0f7f
4b7(1): dang // bsngal pa'i tshe dang ldan no// gzhan yang yon tanan dang ldan te/ gnyen zhing 'jam pa dang / bzang ba da chos bzhin du byas pa'o// de lta bu las sogs pa'i mchod
4b8(1): rnam pa rna tshogs bgams dang / stobs pa'i 'byung ba'i namo/ mas gong drung tu dgas so// gzhan sadag ser kyi rnamam pa pa'i ba ma te/ 'i mal cagazhan dung / khab pa pa dang / da
4b9(1): nyid du bting ba mi khor khor yug tu/ dpag tshad bcu gnyis chum chad g.yogs par byas so// sangs rgyas dang / dge' 'dun 'thugs pa'i rin po che lnga bdu gi seng ge'i khri bgams te/ khri de dag kyang dbang du mtho'i bya ring ba sun
4b10(1): po dang mnya' 'o/ 6/ khri de dag gi nyer na rin po che'i kun phub nas/ de bzhas rnal pa yang ma kyangasa'o// rdza sa'i ning de dag la yang ram pa snga tshogs kyi 'dan sbyangs te/ gzugs bres nab/ rnam pa sna chogs kyi blos gsung gi
5a1(1): gakyi 'de 'bru' dadagal btums/ zhing gi bar yang ma thog rnam pa mtshogs kyis 'ams par bkang do// dge nyen denams so so nas srid pani wAn rgya 'bas so// so so'i bye na
5a2(1): nye bzhal bas brel sa bka' ba sbyin no// btung bas brel pa la 'dung ba/ 'go ba'od pa rnams sa mgo myig 'dod pa rnams pa byeg/ de ltar ma ma'i skye bo dag ci 'dod pa bzhi du/ khams cad byi pa gyi
5a3(1): phyi pa de yang 'dobadags dang / me tha dang / gtizug dang / rnyog pa'i sesas byed do/ de bar gzham pa'i 'jig rten ni songs spyo byed/ bsam pa'i sems byed kyi/ blan byed pa mongs sri na rdo'i
5a4(1): byang chub 'ba' zhig gi phyir ro// dges tes ded ge zam dbyed pa'i byang chub la bde bar gnas nas yang 'od snyam du sa no/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi mcho pa 'di bzhesams yongs su
5a5(1): thud ma'ang mnyam 'bab na/ de dag gi rgyas kyi 'astams te/ sras khras kyis rgyal ga mi ma chog pa lags thar byudang / byig sa ti pa hrI / skun lnga chen thob gdus
5a6(1): byung te/ so so nas mchod pa'i lo khyad pa rnams pa/ spos kyi zhing bye dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdan dang / gdugs dang / zhal las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs/ rin po che'i shing rtas bzlas nas / te sangs rgyab sa
5a7(1): ring po 'i phyin pa dang / bangs rgyas kyi zhabs la gyi bos phyag 'chas te/ mchod pa'i ma byang bzhams nas// de bzhin gshesas smral mchod de/ na tu thong du bskod nas/ gang sru ste du b+he chu ba'i rnas sa
5a8(1): g.yos so// brang drung zhing tshong 'debs ste/ mchi' mchar bzhin du 'thags nas/ gcig la cig 'di skad du/ kyi hud kyi dung grogs po dag 'jig rten spongs so// 'jig rten pa stongs so zhes smras na de bzhin
5a9(1): gshegs pa'i khyam tha lus brdabs ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// de bzhin gshegs/ sa thugs rtse pa'i thang du// bdag gcag kyis mchod pa bzham sa bya gnang gI la ma byung bzhes TIg ces gson
5a10(1): to// bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas cang byi gsung ste ma kha zhes nas/ de bzhin du lan gsun gyi bad+ma du gsos dkyang ba zhes sum gnang ngo // dgen bsnyen de dag bsam pa bzhin du ma byung nas/ mya ngan gis
5b1(1): gdungs te car gyi smra bar 'khod pa ni/ dper na pha sa gi nang tu byams pa'i bu gcig pa blo bung du nad kyis btab rdzi che 'phos rgyam chung chub skya te/ shin su myo mags me gdu sa pa dang / 'dra ba dge brkyen de ga rgyar
5b2(1): am yang gdungs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ mchod pa'i yo byung rnams gnas gcig tu bzhag nas/ phyog sa gcig tu nyad pyi smra bar 'dzad // / de ga ci gzhan ya bkrung gang 'ga' gsum gi bye ma snyed kyi/ dgen ma
5b3(1): khrims su yongs su srung ba/ pyod lam dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/ dge' bsnyem ma tshol ba'i yon tan dang / dge' bsnyen sa dpal gi 'phreng ba dang / dgel bsnyen ma byig ga las sogs pas thog ma drangs man
5b4(1): dgel bsnyen ma brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed thams cad kyang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa/ bems can chab myed pa brgya stong 'dus pa'i phying/ phung byed kyi chus ston cing / khyim gyi chos yongs su spong pa bdag kyi lus sbrul
5b5(1): bajug la ba'i das dra bar ma pa/ thugs cag tu zin bu grangs byed padapa' dang / lus 'di sa gas tu ston pa dang / das sa ma thu bcings par rtogs pa/ lul 'di la kyi rang ba 'dra ya ma
5b6(1): su rung ba dang / lus 'di ni gyi thang ba ste/ bu gsun ba tan tupar rtogs la sus 'di ni mkham dang 'dran/ shu 'a / pangangs dang / rgyas pas rnam par 'akris pa yag gang banang 'dzi
5b7(1): kha ga gnyen lta bur gyung dpa/ myig ni sa zhung sa bung gyur pa'i/ mgo 'ani khang pa sa bur gyur ba de/ sems rgyal po dang 'dra ba ngo'i nang ma nan pa le snyoms pa/ sum pa khar 'dra ba 'di mi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam/ 
5b8(1): kyis yongs su grangs te/ byas pa po pol skye bo dag ni de rmugs par byed do// 'dod chags dang / zhes pa dang / gti mug gi khyim bu gnas par rtogs pa/ yum 'di ni snying po steng ba ste/ 'dam bu'i gyi ku 'am/ e ram hA la/ 
5b9(1): rgya r+g+hA b+h+ya / chub tha / sum 'dzin gyigs pa ste/ gang sdig par ci tum ma nying / dbed thon 'dadang / gapang po phru la/ mas 'ang/ hU~M N+Da ya/ rgyala'i mazus pa gsung tshugs pa/ 
5b10(1): 'di ni 'gyur zhing 'khol ba ste/ dper na 'bru 'gram g.yang sa'i sdong po sa bur rtogs la/ lus 'di ni ring zong gyi thogs par ste/ zung kyi dang / bad pa dang / brim bya dang / thug pa dang / bya rgod dang / khwa dang/ zhe ba dang / N+ya gas
6a1(1): ma so rnang bya de ma bya bya byed pa deco bye man kyi nabaco yo yo 'i
6a2(1): ga cing mthong ba'o// sam la phyin cim log pa nyid do// zhi gnas rgya ma pa'o// na ya ngas rgyas ma 'debs pa'o// sems rnyed ngas pa skyed nyidado// chos la mngon par dus
6a3(1): khyod pa nad byed sring na// rgya thun pa'i spyod pa la rlon pa nyid do// sngon gyis na par 'du byed pa la yid 'byung ba'o// rab gi las yongs su myo zhing 'du stsa ma yin pa med pa'o//  pa rgya
6a4(1): 'byon pa'o// the tshom myi 'dzind pa'o// dus su 'byod pa nyid do// dus ma yin pa rnam par spong ba nyid do// 'gro ba dang ldog pa la mkhas ba'o// chog shes pa nyid do// yo byad kyis chog shes pa'o// mngon
6a5(1): bye brag can no// snying stobs rgya che ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bstand pa'o// myi dmyigs las yongs su
6a6(1): pa gas pa rgya me 'o// ci'i 'dzin yo can so// khyod na kyi sa no// nga stogs kyilalo// de
6a7(1): 'azung ba 'o/  rgya mtshon pa dang ldan pa rnams tshim par byed pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyi sas rnams kyi bsgom pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas
6a8(1): bad+d+hon hU~M gakhas pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o// chang shes kyi 'gros kyi pyod yul ta'o/ chos smra ba rnams kyi spyod yul lo// mos pa mang ba rnams la skul ma 'debs pa'o// gajig rten gsum kyi mgon can
6a9(1): mthong ba'i tshul can no// nor don tu gnyer ba rnams kyi mdzod do// rnam par sbyin pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi zhing ngo // gsungs pa rnams kyi kun dga' ya ba'o// gzungs thob pa rnams kyi skyed mos tshal lo// 
6a10(1): mdzin thob pa rnams kyi rdzing ngo // chos dkar po dang ldan pa rnams kyi ma'o// gtam la mos pa rnams kyi grogs s+ho// mtshan rnams kyi rgyu'o// dpel byad rnams rnam lam 'byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
6b1(1): shind tu rigs par smra ba nyid do// bdud kyi yul las 'das pa'o// dge ba rnams kyi yul lo// nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'o// myi dge la
6b2(1): dag la'i gnas so// gzungs rab tu thob pa'o// sgrub pa khong du chud pa'o// 
6b3(1): ma pa'o// smon lam dang ldan pa rnams kyi rgyan no// bdud kyis kyi byed pa'o// bstan pa 'ad myi shes pa'o// mu legs rnams kyis shes par dka' ba'o// 'jig rten dang gyi 'chungs pa'o// nyan thos kyi chos las 'das
6b4(1): ra kya gyi man sa 'byu no// gams nas byed pa ny-id la yang dag par zhugs pa'o// sems pan rnams kyi 'gro sa 'jug pa'o// yang dag pa jig pa bzhin du stsal ma masas/ mtha' ba 'dod pa rnam
6b5(1): kyi dga' bar byed pa'o// 'dung ba 'dod pa rnams kyi le bro ba'o// mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba rnams kyi snying po'o// mya ngan las 'das ya 'gro ba rnams kyi shing rta'o// pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gru
6b6(1): rgal 'dod pa rnams kyi gzings so// snyi rje can rnams kyi mang/ me'o/ chos ston pa rnams kyi skar mda'o// myi slu bar 'dod/ pa rnams kyi gnas so// sbyin pa 'dod pa rnams kyi nor yin/ 
6b7(1): no/ grol bar 'dod pa rnams kyi rigs pa'o// ched mo don tu gnyerab rnams dang par byed pa'o// nyan pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyi rgya mtsho'o// ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnams kyi ri rab bo// myig la
6b8(1): dga' ba rnams kyi dbang po'o// lha/ 'dod pa rnams kyi bkod pa'o// sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi dga' ba'o// phyir myi ldog pa rnams kyi gnas pa'o// myi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi bsam pa'o// las
6b9(1): dang po bya rnams kyi thos na'o/ skyes bu shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi rgyal ma na do// deganas la 'thur mi byed pa rnams kyi byang chub 'o// bdag myed pa sna pa rnams kyi sred byed kyi thu'o// thams pa mkhyen
6b10(1): da kyilam mi nyishes dgas par grog pa rnams kyi skye ma mnyas pa nyid do/ gnasus kyis bsngags pato// bla rnams kyis yin go// skyonams kyim sathod pa no//  garnam
7a1(1): tsaM/ da gdu byas pa'o// kyai srob pa rnams kyis phyag byas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis stond pa'o// chos kyi rje rnams kyis bsgoms pa'o// dbang po sbas pa rnams kyi grong khyer ro// thabs mkhas
7a2(1): rnams kyi tshul so// rtson gams kyi rnyed pa'o// cos rnams gses dusa'o// yid gnyis gcod pa'o// don mongs pa rnams mesan na no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzum mo// nad pa rnams kyi san
7a3(1): kha'o// byin ci log pa rnams ni gsob pa'o// gzug rtsu 'byind pa'o// mngon par 'dod pa rnams yid la byed pa'o// sgrogs par 'dod pa rnams kyi myi 'jigs pa'o// smra bar 'dod pa rnams kyi se so yang dag par
7a4(1): rig pa rgya che ba'o// rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yo/ nyan 'dod pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o// lta 'dod pa rnams kyi myigako/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam mo// ngan song rnams kyi spong ba
7a5(1): 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs myed pa dag las 'das pa/ 'og sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin da lend pa'o// srid pa lam dag seng ge'i gdan sa/ 
7a6(1): 'dug pa'o// chud za ba myed par don tu gnyer ba rnams kyi dge ba'i za ba thams cad do// spyo ba rnams dga' bar byed pa'o// ltungab rnams 'degs pa'o// chom pa rnamasna brtan por byed 'a'o
7a7(1): spyod pa'i rnams rnam par sgrub pa'o// snyom las myed pa dag yid la byeda'o pa'o// theg pa gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi bka' yin no// 'dzind pa thams cad spangs pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 
7a8(1): don dam par smra ba rnams kyi sgo ma pa' yas pas bsgrub pa rab tu 'thob pa'o// stong pa nyid smra ba rnams kyi chos chud phyi ma pa'o// smon lam gyi sgo'i gzugs mthar byin pa'o// mtshan ma myed pa la mos pa nas
7a9(1): la brda sprod pa'o// mthong ba dang btang snyoms la mos pa rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la thabs mkhas pa'o// byang chub yongs su stond pa'o// pha rol pos spa gong du myed pa
7b1(1): chos smra ga la ma khrul par tshol ba nyid do// zang zing myed par chos smra gas yang dag par ston pa'o// chos nyand pa la g.yeng ba myed pa'o// 'khom la/ brnyas pa myed pa'o// chos kyis sbyin pa la bar chad myed pa'o// des pa nas
7b2(1): pa ma sa che du byed pa'o// babyod pa rnam sar gses pa'o// smo pa la rgyun chad pa byed pa'o// leshes kyi mogs yongs su kyi gdong ba'o// badzid pa sa gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par grol pa'o// sus
7b3(1): ba rnams rdul bar byed pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams 'dor ba'o// myi gnas pa la 'aspyod pa'o// rjes su dran pa 'dod pa rnams kyi dran pa 'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi slob par byed pa'o// 'khor bzhi la ston
7b4(1): pa'o// ro 'phro ba rnams kyi nang na mngar ba'o// rnam par 'phrul/ ra bar 'dod pa rnams kyi sgra sgrogs pa'o// spris pa las ldog par 'dod pa rnams kyi sgo 'byed pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa thard
7b5(1): ba'o// yus bde ba'o// sems bdel ba'o// mkhas pa rnams/ dga' ba'o// yi dam la brtan rnams myi gtong ba'o// de bzhinagashegs pa'i yon tan las kyi ldog pa'o// dge ba'i rdza ba rnas
7b6(1): kyi gnas so// myi dge ba rnams rjes par 'joms pa'o// 'chas pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi slab pa'o// rigs la la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas pa'o// bskya ba myed par mchod pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis
7b7(1): gnang pa sgrub pa'o// ye shes kyi phung po'i snang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stond pa'o// dril bye ba snyed dri ba'o// chos dkar po dag la rtog pa'o// skye ba'i blo can rnams kyi dmyigs pa'o// shes rab thun pa rnams
7b8(1): kun gyi ma 'o// rigs pa ma rnams dga' phyir 'byud do// sgra 'dod pa rnams kyi 'amyod pa'i rgyu'o// chos stond pa rnams srung ba'o// sgrubams pa yongs su shes pan/ chos thams cad la mkhas na// 
7b9(1): pa'i thabs zlab la'o// de kho na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba'o// bdag la rnga sprod pa'o// gzhan dag yang dag par tshi mkhar byed pa'o// dra la gcod pa'o// ma rig pa ga sel ba'o// phung po rnams
8a1(1): thang banyid dang / mtshams byang ba dang / ljon 'byeng mamachas sa sems 'dris gosas par byed pa des pasas te/ btsun mo'asas gsum pa 'ad po dang / brgyan mo 'dod pa'i rton tan mthog pa pas thog
8a2(1): drangs so// thams cad kyang das pa 'chos la gnas shing / tshul khrims yongs su srung ba/ spyod lam dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la bya gcig pa dang 'dra bar byams pa sha stag go// de dag kyang gcig sa cig 'di thang chu bdag
8a3(1): cag kyang byung bse sangs rgyas gan bzhugs pa deng 'dong ba'is smras so// rgyal po'i btsum mo rnams kyis mtshang ba'i yo byang bgams pa sa/ snga la gas bdun 'gyung gis rdzas te/ me tog dang / thob dang / ring ba
8a4(1): rgyas bcas dang / rang gi ba dam dang / gdug pa dang / zhal bas mchog mam / rin pa che'i gdugag nang 'i chung du yang/ rgya 'a rnam de thag tung bgacang bcu drug zabasa'o// ba dang dang ga rgya la
8a5(1): dpag tshang gsul bcu ma drug nyed ngo // rim blo rgyal mtsham nang/ king ma'i chad kyang dpag chad drug bsu brgyang skyed do// / zhal mas kyi drig sung byis kyang / dpag tsang brgyad kyi bar bu mchod dang/ 
8a6(1): yod byar de lta bu dag bzhams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gal pa ri so pa ste/ phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gyi gos phyag nas/ lam brgya stob bu bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das lal 'di skad ces gsol to// 
8a7(1): bcos ldan 'das bdag gcig gis/ 'angs rgyab dang / da ke' 'dun rnams la mchong ba 'i yo byang bgams te dbus pa 'di/ tu de bzhi gshegs pas bdag gcag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang gi phas 'di ba zhes shi'i ces gsong to// de brji
8a8(1): gshegs pab tub mkhyen pas cang skyil lung nab bzhes sum gnang ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams bsams pa bzhim du mi gyur pa nas/ shinang tu mya ngan gis yid gdungs te/ sgra 'jam zhing brang la thal mo rdebs te/ tsho rngub pa ma
8a9(1): bu'i nangan sdug pazhi ga dang 'dra bar gyur rams/ phyogs gcig tu cang byi sgru bar 'khod ngo // de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang 'ga' brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi lha'i bu mo rnams la 'dis ste/ lnga'i bu mo yangs pa'i byi ga ces bya bas thob par dngas ma
8a10(1): 'di skad ces smras so// kye grogs po ngag mthong ngam ltos shig/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po sgra mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa/ sna tshogs babams nas/ de bzhin gshegs gdang / dge' slong gyi dge la 'dun la dbu ba mabo dam/ byangs
8b1(1): gcig kyang mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha zhes pa'i 'og tu mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// kye grogs mo dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du
8b2(1): gshegs pa yang shi nad tu dka'/ mchod pa nang gi tha ma bshams te dbul ba yang shi nad tu dka'o// gal te/ bcom ldama? 'das mya ngan las 'das na 'jig rten stongs bod 'gyur lo zhes smras so// lha'i bu mo de rnams kyang theg pa chen po thos par
8b3(1): mos pa thos nas kyang gzham sa rgya cher ston nus pa/ theg pa chen po la skom pas gtungs pa ltar gyur da cing / bdag shin tu ngoms par byed pa skom pas gtungs pa/ gzhan yang ngoms khar byed pa/ theg pa chen po la skyob la spob pa gzhani la zhu gaH
8b4(1): ba dag/ theg pa chen po la sun 'byind cing phra dog byed pa yod na/ ji ltar thA la ser pa 'bab pa bzhin du shi nad tu thul ba// tshul khrims yu ung ba/ myod lam dang ldan pa/ 'jig rtend thams cad kyi yid dang shi nad tu sbyor ba la shi na tu mkhas pa
8b5(1): mdul ba rnams rdul ba/ ma grol ba rnamam grol bar byed pa/ byis ma dge ba'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bkor zhing / dkon mchog gsum zhi gdus myi char pa bcob pa/ theg pa chen po la nam tan byed cib brgyam chen po la gam tu
8b6(1): brgyan tha/ de lta bu'i yon tan tshad myed pa dang ldan pa/ sems cam thams/ cad la yang bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar byams pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang snga dro'i tus nyi ma thog mar shar pa nas/ so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha'i shing
8b7(1): gzhung can bzhasa' ba ni/ byi 'i shing gsung can las khyang bar du gyung bab/ shIng gyi gsung des myo'i 'jig rten da/ mnam zhing dri gyi nim 'a thams cad ni ma byed pa/ shing rta dkar po la gdugal dkar po bres te/ rtang kar po ba zhis dres
8b8(1): pa'i/ shing rta lde re'i steng yang gur dkar pos phulo ba/ gur gi tha ma yang ser gi dril bus byangs pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi blos dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / zhal zas sna tshogs dam pa dang / 
8b9(1): rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs bshams te/ seng ge'i 'dam bting ngo // seng ge li ba dam gi rkang pa bzhi yang bye du r+ya mtho ba ting las byas pa/ de'i rgyab mi rin po che snga 'dum gyi sA rten dang bcas pa/ mdun yang ser las byas pa'i sngas re re yod pa
8b10(1): rin po che balnga bdun gi rlomam me'i sdong po la/ nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sgoms ldang ba/ sa ba mi thams cad wA'i me tog gis 'chas bar bkod la/ de lta grung sa sna'i bu mo rnams kyis babams nas/ yid gdung zhing mchim lan te
9a1(1): rdul can pa bya ba/ sem sa bas lapa san padang des gyibad bdan nas sangs nyid bzar bar bya ba dang / de ba'i shes pa nyegapas bas kyis
9a2(1): ldan 'das bdagag cags thugs ste ba'i thang tu/ mchod pa bzhams pa nang gisam 'di bzhes zhig ces gso yan to// / bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas cad kyi gsung nas bzhes sul gnang ngo // wa'i bu monams pasams pa na
9a3(1): rgyam rgyas nas/ byang gas shi 'dus me kyi sgru bar phyogs cid tu nga/ de'i kyi gzhan yang zung kang ngas da bu'i byes nyid kyi bu'i bye to/ dbyugs pazhim rnags pa la te/  rgya mo na songs su
9a4(1): po rag sa thong pa chu'i rgyab po sem sa'as la sogs 'as sogs/ ras das/ bu'i rgyas so mas kyi ma dro dus kyi nyis thogs gang ban/ narangakyil sa nag pa'i batshang ba'i so kyang bags pa da / 
9a5(1): bco ldan 'das gan pa desarnags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sa mgo 'thos phyag 'chab nas/ gan brgya stong tu mgong te/ sa ldan 'das la 'di gang ces gsos to// bcob sam 'das bdagagan/ 
9a6(1): 'azugs rtse ba'i thang du/ mchod pa nang gyis ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhi ma gshegs pas sgrungs pas cang gyi gsunganas pa zhes yum gnang na// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnabs kyang babathas pa bzhin brkyang ba
9a7(1): bya ngan gib yang gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/  de'i tshe gzhan yang krung gapa 'amal brgya'i bye ma snyed kyi gnod skyom gyi rgyal po la ba po so las lathogs pas thog mar drangs nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye byeb bu dag byung
9a8(1): ba gangs rgyas gan pa des sadang ngo // zhes smras nas/ klu bas rnas par bzhams te/ bcom ldam 'das ka na par lpags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'bas sa kyi 'os phya ga 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'di sa sa ni na
9a9(1): bcom ldan 'das bdag gcags lugs rtse ba'i srang du/ mchod pa snanyams pa nang gi tham 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to/ de la bcom ldan 'das cang sti gsung pam ba zhes su ma gan / nr-i gnod sbyin gyi rgyal don pas bya ba tham
9b1(1): pa bzhin du ma gyu rang nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe/ gzhan ya krung gang+gA 'gal nyi bu'i bye ma nyid/ nam ka ldi gi rgyal po las rgol pa bcog zhes bya bas thogs pa drangs to// gzhan nga
9b2(1): klung gang 'ga' gsum bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi dri za'i rgyal po mthu' po ches thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang 'a/ la bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi myi 'am mchi'i rgyal po shin tu mthong ba zhes bya bas shog ma ba drangs so// gzhan yang klung
9b3(1): gang 'ag rdza bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdo phye chen po lergya la po/ shin bum thong la chen po zhes bya bas log mar drangs pod // gzhan yang klung gapa 'ga' brgya bcu'i bye ba snyed kyi srin po'i rgyal po rigs su rung zhes byams pog par drang mo
9b4(1): de dag sdig pa myi dgel ba'i sems yongs su spangs nas/ myi ya myi za ba dang / dgra dang mkhon tu 'gyur ba la byams shing snying rje ba'i sems skye ga dade/ gzugs kyi sdug pa sangs rgyas kyi khyim rlabs kyis thams cad bzang zhing sdug
9b5(1): par gyur to// gzhan yang klung gang 'ga' chu bcul snyed kyi nags 'aN+Dal sa dbang pa'i wa'i dri bablang / dga' ba zhes bya bas log par drangs so// gzhan yang krung ga 'ga' stong gi bye ma snyed kyi rigs 'ari nang gi rgyal
9b6(1): bo rdzu baphru'i chen po zhes bya ba sa log yar drangs 'o// gzhan / yang krung gang 'ga' 'bum gyi bye ba snyed kyi 'dangs la 'a'i rgyasan po na tu mtho nas bralam mo ba dngas so// gzhan sa krung gas
9b7(1): 'ga' khri phrag brgya'i bye ma nyid kyi lnga 'i bu mo 'dod chags can kham pa da ung bzhi dang / te lotsas dang / phyi sha ka la sogs pas thonadrangs so// gzhan yang klung gang 'ga' khri phrag stong gi bye ma snyed kyis
9b8(1): gaganas pa'i yi dgas kyi rgyal po gzhog dkar zhes bya bas thog sam drangs so// gzhan yang krungag pa 'gal 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi sba lo zas po rnams dang / skra'i rgyal lo phyogs bzhi'i 'gon po ma thog par drangs
9b9(1): gzhan yang klu ga pa 'ga' 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi/ klung gi lhas phyogs bzhi nas/ sa las skyes pa'i me tog gi tum dang / dus ma yin pa rnams pa la'i shing drung du 'chal dbar bkang ngo // gzhan yang klung gang 2
9b10(1): 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rlung dang chang pa la dbang ba'i lha rnams ning / 'di snyam du bdag gcag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas zhugs la zhen pa na/ char rab tu phab ste dus su mye shi bar bya ba dang / 'khor gyi/ 
10a1(1): na kyil 'khongasas chabs gdungs pa rnams kyang / gan tu ba'i bar bya so sa du shems / gzhan yang krung gang 'ag kyi bu'i bye sa zed kyi thos kyi ba lang ces do/ ba la ga rgyam po ca dang / bas bca
10a2(1): gser can dang / ba grang gi rgyal long ngang ba'i pha dang / ba ma glang gi rgyal po mngon gring byig dang / mam grang gi rgyal po 'thung tsam la stsogs pas thog mar drangs te/ de dag palas cad kyang theg pa chen po la sti stang byed pa/ theg pa chen
10a3(1): po la khos pa 'akag ste/ de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ring por myi logs papa/ mya ngan las 'das par shes pas pa so nas pad mo bzang po tshang byed dpag tu byed pa zung ste/ sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das gan pa rer
10a4(1): sngags nas// gdong gis phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu spong ngo /  gzhan yang krung gang 'ag nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge sgra zhes bya bas thog ma drangs te/ sems can thams cadas
10a5(1): gyi 'jigs pa byin nas/ so so nas me tog dang / 'bras bu thogasate sangs rgyab gem par lpags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu spong ngo // gzham ya krung
10a6(1): nang 'gal nyi 'u'i bye ba snyed kyi bya'i rgyal po dang ba dang / dub ga dang /  bya dang / ken 'ad gang de/ ka lam ta dang / su yong dang ne tse dang / ko sha si dang / ba ti ka dang / ka la bying ka dang
10a7(1): 'tsho byeb la sogs pa bya'i rgyal po rnams dang / so so nas me tog dang / 'bras bu thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na par ldags nas na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu spong ngo // gzham
10a8(1): yang krung ka pa'aga' nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi chu zla pa dang / ba dang lug dang / la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kan par sngags nas/ grong khyer tha mchog gi 'ob bas dang / shing shong thams cad kyang gri gsung dang dran pa kha dog dang / ro rje
10a9(1): par ldan pa yi loms gang par byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu sdod do// gzhan yang krung gapa 'gal nyi shu 'i bye sa snyed kyi gling bzhi ma gnas pa li/ drang srong ba zob gcam zhes bya las thog mar drangs te/ lo so nas mye tog dang / thos
10a10(1): dang / 'bras bu ri pa la soms lnga thogs te/ sangs rgyas gapan par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 'khros phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor nas/ bcol ldan 'das la 'di rkang ces gastson to// 
10b1(1): bcom ldan 'das bdag gcag la thugs le ba'i slad du/ mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyend pas cad myi ka su dbas pa zhes u ma gnang nas/ drang srong rnams bsams
10b2(1): pa bzhin du ma gyuradad nas/ mya ngan gis yid gtungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi bung ba'i rgyal po sgra snyan ces bya bas thog mar drangs te/ pud pa thams cad kyang me tog rnam pa sna chog gathogs te/ sangs rgyas
10b3(1): kang ma par lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lam gcig bskor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa 'i dge' slong dang / dge la slong ma thams cad 'dus te/ de la gnyis
10b4(1): ma gtogs pa ni 'od srung chen po dang / kun dga' bo dang / gzham yang 'jig rten gi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa klu dag pa 'ga'i bye ma snyed dang / 'dzam bu gling gi ri la sogs pa ri rab ri'i rgyal pos thog mar drangs te
10b5(1): ri de dag thams cad kyang shin tu brgyan pa ni/ nags 'tshal rgyas pa dang / shing rnams kyi lom dang / ya ga ga/ yang ran par nyi ba'i 'od chod pa dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs rgyas pa dang / kho ra khor yug tu 'bab
10b6(1): chu dang / chu myig yongs su dag tsang dri gsung dang ldan pa dang / lba daHklu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham yin dang / nam mkha' rdzing dang / myi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po dang / rigs
10b7(1): 'dzinang dang / drang sro la sogs pas rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pas/ yongs su gang bar gyur ngo to// lha dang drang srong de nga/ kyang bcom ldan 'das ka ngam par lpags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs
10b8(1): la gyi 'os phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khor do// gzham yang grangs myed pa'i klung gapa' ga'i bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtshol bzhi yi lnga dang / 'bab chu kun gyi lnga gzil brjid chen po dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang
10b9(1): ldan pa/ rnams kyang ldam pa las ldag pas mchod pa'i yo byad bzhams te/ lha rnams kyi yul kyi 'od dang / rol go lim byang dang me mar gyis nyi zla la 'od kyang gyi sda bar byas nas/ me tog tsam pa ka sa klungs ri ba ti
10b10(1): logs su gtor te/ sangs rgyas gangan par lpags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe grong khyer mchog gi shing sa la'i tshal thams cad kyang sku bor gyu ra te/ 
11a1(1): steng gi nam mkha' la rin po che sna bdun gi gzhal byed khar 'bur nga ba'i yo rngam pa/ brgyand kyis mdzes pa kho na 'od lug tu rin po lnga tshogs kyis smras pa/ gzhal myi khang gi drung matu byig dang / rdzing bu she
11a2(1): ma'us sa tho rtog par po skyes pa 'i/ byang kyis kyi nyan nas/ gsum bcu rtsa gsum gnas gi skyed mo bcas pasi nang tu dkrol ba zhes bya ba dang / 'dra bar 'byung bar gyur to// de'i chen zhings pa'i 'anas kun tanam pa tho
11a3(1): kyis brgyan ci bzhin du ying du 'ong bar gyur to// de'i tshe wA dang gyi dang / baja ma yin la sogs pa 'am sa cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mye ngan las 'das pa'i sas im bur rig nas/ thams par bya ngan 'is yi gdung
11a4(1): rtsib sabs to// deg ma mam ca yo/ shAbyis da gang kyas dgas gi sa se 'di sa dang/  bye'i bum 'dzi rten dub sa sa sa dang byings mas mi sa tho sags sa
11a5(1): bshams to// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod la shos bdag can kyang de bzhim bu mchod par bya'o// gang bdag gcag gis nang / ki la mar mchod ma/ sbyin pa'i pha ros pasu byin dra pa yongs su 'os
11a6(1): bar res zhes smras 'o// den brgyas chen rigs pani'i rnarnams kyis ma ba sam pas zhi nang du ldas pad bzhams pa la/ 'jig te ma tan sa ma dral ba dang / mam dang ba chen po dang / me tog ka ni sa ke nga
11a7(1): rtogag cimi ga chen po dang / rume tog san 'jug ka dang / man thun ka chen po dang / mem tog kan tu ni ka dang // kan ta ni ka chen po dang me tog yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du 'ong ba chen po dang / me tog kum du bzang po dang / 
11a8(1): tog tu bdan dang / rdub camachen go dang / mi tog gsung gi grong byer dang / gsung ba byung bye rten po dang / mi tog btu gang ba dang / rib tung gal macom pa dang / mnyan 'dong ldanas dang / 'ad 'ad chen po dang / macos ma
11a9(1): nga / mazung pos can po dang / me tog kun du ba lung dang / kun tu gsung bachen po dang/ me tog na'igasted pa nga / dam stos bu zhes bya ba dang / shing thar bya mam sa dang / gang ga bya rangs tad dang / ga'ang 'das
11a10(1): congs kyi 'asapas zla ba dang ldan pasogs te/ sangs rgyas gang dbyang blags nas bco ldan 'das kyi ba phyi thos kyag ga te/ gnams kyi stod kyi'i zla'i 'ad kyang byid kyi san // mang pa ma byad des kyi
11b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod 'i bye bar bshams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa drul mkhyen pa pas ca myi/ gsung bar bzhes u i gnang ngo // / de'i tshe ldarnams kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur banas/ mya nganags yid gdungs te/ phyogs gci
11b2(1): tu 'khod do// de'i tshe rgya byin lnga'i dbang phyug dang / gsum bcu dam gsum gnam gri lnga rnams kyis snga ma pas shin tu lhag po'i mchod pa'i yo byad bshams nas/ me tog thogs pa yang snga ma dpa'adra te/ dri gsu gos shi nab tu mngad pa ni
11b3(1): yid du 'ong ba ste/ gzhal byed khab brgyal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba dang / gzhal myed kha bachu ngu rnams bshoms te/ sa d+his rgyas gang na khar lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kha gyi pos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
11b4(1): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po lu dad cing mos na/ de bzhin gshegs khas bdag gnag la thugs che pa'i slad du mchod pa 'di bzhes shig ces gsokhar to// bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyend pas
11b5(1): cad byi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo // de nas t+ya byin lnga li 'khor rnams bsems pa bzhin du ma gyu nga nas/ mya ngan/ gis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnas rim pa drug
11b6(1): gyi bar du mchod pa'i yo khyad bshams pa ni/ rim po che'i rgyal mtsham dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / gcig pas kyang gcig bzang pa'o// rim po che'i gdugs nang gi chu dra yang gling bzhi khebs so/ 
11b7(1): bdan nang gi chu du yang rgya mtsho la ba zhi 'khor ba to// / rgyal mtshan nangs skyedamal ba yang gzhan 'phrul rab byed gnam la re ka ste/ rlung gis bskyod na thA skad snyan pa 'byind pa dang / zhal zas phul du byung ba nas
11b8(1): pa sna tshogs bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kha yI khos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gcag la thugs rtse ba'i slad tu
11b9(1): mchod pa nang gi lam 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// / de bzhin gshegs pa tus mkhyen pas cad gyi gsung bas bzhes su ma gnang ngo // de nas lha rnams kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pa nas/ mya ngan gis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig/ 
11b10(1): tu 'khod do// de la gcig ma gtogs pa ni srid pa 'i rtse mo ste/ tshangs pa'i ris kyi ldarnapas kyang 'dus par gyur pa to// de'i tshungs pa'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa ris kyi lnga rnams kyi 'od kyis slong bzhi kun snang bar byas nas
12a1(1): 'dod pa'i khams na lnga dang byi dang / nyi zhwa'i 'od kyang kyi sdang bar bya gsod/ de dag kyang so so nas rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / thogs pa ni ba dan nang gi chu du la bcangs pa'i gnas
12a2(1): nas shings kha'i gatshal la thug pa thogs nas/ sangs rgyas ga na ba der lpags te/ bcom ldam 'das kyi zhabs la ba skye pos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldam 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldam 'das bdag
12a3(1): thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ bdag gcag gi mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shige ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyend pas cad myi gsung bas / bzhes sum gnang ngo // tshangs pa'i lha rnams bsams pa
12a4(1): bzhin du ma gyur nganas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'o de'i tshe rnam yin gi rgyal po 'das langs ris kyis kyang lda ma yin gyi 'khor dpag tu byed pa dang bcas/ lpags so// de rnams kyi lus
12a5(1): kyi 'od kyang tshangs pa'i skabs sngag par gyur te/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang pa dam dang / gdugs rnams thogs te/ gdugs nang gi chu/ du yang 'jig rtem gi khams khebs pa dang / phul du byung ba'i
12a6(1): zhal zas mchog rnams logs nas/ sangs rgyas gang ma par sngags te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs yang ma gol pos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag / 
12a7(1): gtsug la thub pa che ba'i tha du/ mchod pa zhang gi pham 'di bzhes zhig ces gsol to// de bzhi ma gshegs pas rus mkhyen pa pa sa napa myi gsung nas bzhes sum gnang na/ ska ma yin bsams pa bzhin ma chung danas
12a8(1): b+ha ra ma gyis yang brdub te phyogs gcis tu 'bang / de'i tshe 'dod pa'i khams kyi bdud sdig can yad 'khor zhwa'i bu mo grangs byed dpag tu myed pa das bcas ste/ sems cam dbyal ba'i rdo byenas yongs su bas
12a9(1): na dag pa'i chu ba te/ de dag la 'di skang ces spo // khyed la sogs pa ka' ma ci yang myi nus kyi ses pa ste gcig du de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dram par gis yang mthor ba byed la lta sa
12a10(1): su yi rang bar gis shig dang / khyod yun ring por/ rab tu bde par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud sdig nyam de/ sems can dmyal pa'i nga mtshon ma dang / sdug sngal du gyu da pA ya me rab tu 'bar bA yang bsil kha'i char kis zhi bang byas nas
12b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang 'di nyam du sems skyed par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyis ril gyi dnge/ mngal ba yul dang / go ma dang mnom na pa ti nga / sngags kyo dang / sman ze nga/ dpra da
12b2(1): 'khor lo dang / zhags pa la mogs la mchom cha thams cad spangs nas/ mchod pa'i yo byad wA rab gyi las khyang bar du 'gyur pa bshams mo// gtugs napa ki chu ru yang stong 'bring po'i 'jig rten gi kham pa khebs pa logs nas
12b3(1): sangs rgyas gangal ba der zhugs te/ bcob ldam 'das kyi zhabs la gyi thos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di ska shes gsol to// bcom ldam 'das bdag cag kyang theg pa rnam po ma dang ba mos te/ thog pa chen po sru
12b4(1): bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu o/ gang zhig/ khe dang grags pa'i phyir ram/ gzhan sma ka ba 'i phyir ras/ gzhan la rdzum bya ba'i byir dam/ no dang zang zi yi phyibal pa/ gzham yang
12b5(1): stong dang byo par bya ba'i byeng theg pa chen maston par byed pa na/ 'din yang tra/ rdum yang rung / bdag gcag gis romamag pa bag de 'jigs gas sa ba'i phyi/ gamang sngags 'di chus so/ 
12b6(1): cog kye ta ta la cog kye yon so/ ma sa gos le/ A ya tsal ta lapa hA// gsang sngags/ 'di ni sems stong pa rnams dang 'jig sa skrag pa rnams/ chos sgrub dang / ye ba dag pa'i chos kyi
12b7(1): bar du myi gcod pa dang / mu stegs can 'dul ba dang / bdag gi lus srung ba dang / g.yang dag pa 'i chos srung ba dang / theg pa chen po srung brje srad du/ gas sngags 'di dbul lo// gang gyi thegs sngam
12b8(1): 'od yid la lagying na/ ba yang rmis pa'i 'jigs pa 'ang bral bar 'gyub/ gas to 'brog dgon pa 'am/ yulas ljong pa bag cha ba 'i gnas su mchis ma yang / 'jigs par myi 'gyur/ chu dang me dang / seng sa dang / stag dang / 
12b9(1): kyang ku dang / dgras 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po 'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa la yang yang pran 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gis gsang sngags 'di yid la bgyis na/ 'jigs pa de dag la sogs pa thams cadabadang
12b10(1): bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gas sngags 'dzin pa la/ bdag gcaseM gyis rtsub zhing swa ga me/ wi b+har mu pA la yams ga sred pa bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das bdag gcag mi g.yol dang sgras 'di skad sum+b+ha
13a1(1): de nas bcom ldam 'das kyis bdud sdig tongs pa 'di skad ces pa kal sa yang to// khyod kyi na sa mas mchod pa dngabul pa 'di rnams ni gyi ba zhes so// 'gro ba bams ca dang / 'khor nam pani sa 'a'am sa dang bde ba'i
13a2(1): byi/ gas bsngags 'di bzhes po bka' banas nas/ cang myi gsung bar gzhan ni bzhes su sa gnang // de ltar gsum gi bar tu gsol kyang bzhes su ma gnang nas/ bdud sdig tocan gyis pa sams pa bzhin du
13a3(1): ma byung nas/ su ngam gyis yang gdungs te/ phyags gcig tu thod do/ ra / de'i tshe lda bar gyur chen po yang/ 'khom sa grangs byed dpag tu byed pa dab bcis te/ mchod pa'i lo byad bzhams pa ya ba chang ba za dang
13a4(1): brgya byin dang / 'jig rten gi 'gon go bzhi dang / sgra dang byi dngasna ma yin sde brgyad dang / myi ma yin la sogs pas/ mchodan pa'i yo byad rnams 'i kha kyis gnon pa n-i/ pis gsas pa'i dru
13a5(1): na zhes gzhan dag pa dang mthe khams cad kyi ldang bar gyur to/  rim pa che'i gzugs nang gi tshu ngas sto ga sul ni stong chen po 'jig rten gi kham pa yongs su 'i bas pa'i/ mcho pa'i po byad
13a6(1): la sogs pa khogs te/ sangs rgyas gang ma pade sngagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gcag gyis mchong ba'i yo byad nad kyi tha ma 'di dbul bA mi/ rdzi ga bdag ska bus mchodapa
13a7(1): dbul la 'am/ chu nyis pa gang rgya mtsho la chem por blugs pa 'am/ me mar chung du ma gcig gis 'od kyis nyin/ brgya stong la sa pa 'am dbyar me tog gi nang tu rgyas pa'i dus su me tog gcig thogs te me tog mang po che
13a8(1): thod du bzhag pa 'am/ yungs kar 'bral bu gcig tsam/ ri rab kyi rgyal po la sangs ma/ rgya mtshol dang nyi ma dang / me tog mang po dang / ri rabs myi ldan pa dpa'am pad/ bcom ldan 'das padag gnag gi mnod
13a9(1): @'ang de dang 'dra'o// gal te stong gsum ki stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang / me tog dang / rol mo dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su bkang b+he/ mchod kyang zlos pa 'i rin du myi lad+ha la~Mwa~M
13b1(1): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba mang po'i slad du sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol/ song gi skye gnas su lcug sngal mang po len to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag gcag la thugs lte ba'i
13b2(1): slad du mchod pa 'di dag pa zhes gsol to// / de'i tshe 'di nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams klung gang 'ga' bye ma grangs khyed/ dpag tu byed pa 'das pa'i pha rol tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan zhes bya
13b3(1): ba na/ sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ mkhyend pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde' bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ bla ni myed pa
13b4(1): skyes bu 'dul zhing //  kho sgyur ba/ l+le dang myi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas des// nye gnas chen po la 'di skad ces/ ba ka las khang to// rigs kyi bu khyod songs
13b5(1): 'di nas nub phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba na/ sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya lang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldams
13b6(1): bde' bar gshegs pa 'jig rten rig pa/ bla na myed pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang myi rnams kyi ston dpa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ring po gyi thogs par yongs su mya ngan
13b7(1): las 'da' bar nye'o// rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gi khams 'di le zhal zas gsung can/ dri shi nad tu zhim pa yid du 'ong zhing bde bar gyu rod pa/ 'di thogs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul gcig/ btsu/ 
13b8(1): ldan 'das de la gsol nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gshegs so// rigs kyi bu khyod de la phyag 'tshal zhing the tsom du gyur pa pa yang zhu ba la dus la kha' bo// de nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen no
13b9(1): lus dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la A bos phyag 'tshal te/  lan gsum skor nas/ byang chub sems dpe' grangs skyed dpag tu myed pa dang thabs gcig tu/ sangs rgyas
13b10(1): kyi zhing de nas kyi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangan pa de mdong ngo // de'i tshe ma stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams rnam kha drug du g.yos nas/ 'khor gi nang na tshangs pa dang rang brgya byin dang / phyogs pazhi
14a1(1): mtshan po dang / bdud bris rko dang / dbang bla bachen zas mags pa de dag gas pa ga yos par mthongasas lus kyi bu'i zhes byed de ste yang gsas pa cas du thangs blag par byas te/ ma ma 'gro bar/ 
14a2(1): chas nas/ lus kyi 'od dang gzil brjid kyang myi sdang bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nu gyung ba 'dug pa las langs te/ 'khor gi dkyil 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smram zo// rigs kyi grangs khyed 'dzin pa
14a3(1): pang la byed gcig/ byed pa 'jigs shig/ de ci'i phyir med/ 'di nas gang phyogs na 'jig rten gi kham sa ga 'gas krung gi bye ma snyed grangs byed dpag tu byed pa 'das pa'i pha rol dam/ 'jig rten gi khams yid du 'dra ba'i tha 'a
14a4(1): ces bya ba na/ sangs rgyas nam ka dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin de gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan gsum bcu dang ldan par bzhug to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus
14a5(1): dpag tu byed pa zhes bya ba/ 'khor byang chub sems dpal grangs byed pa/ dab bcas te/ 'jig rten gi khams 'dir de bzhin gshegasapa la mchod du 'ongs pas/ byang chub sems de'i gzib brjong pa byin
14a6(1): kyis khyed kyi lus kyi 'od kyang gyi snang bar gyur pa to// de bas mkhyed ma/ 'jigs par shi nang tu dga' ba skyed gcigade'i ma 'khor gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/ rgyang ma nas sangs rgyas de dang / 'khor yang zo
14a7(1): rnams mthong ba ni/ ji ltar me long gsal ba li na na/ bdag gi gzugs rten mabong pa bzhin no// de nas yang 'jam dpal gyis 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed kyis sangs rgyas de mthob pa ni/ ci skar
14a8(1): sangs rgyas 'di mthong ba dnga'adra bar/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gzhan yang / sangs rgyas phyogs dku ma bzhugs pa li dpag tu myed pa snyed kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po gcig la
14a9(1): cig 'di skad du/ kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten stongs so// 'jig rten stongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ring por myi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smras so// de'i tshe na 'khor gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis
14a10(1): sa pa ga nga mas te/  da 'phru ba sa na byas/  na cu
14b1(1): khri brgyad stong snyed yod do// grong khyer de yang chu zheng gapa pa grong khyer yangs pa tsam dpa mnyam ste ra ba dang / 'o babras kyang rim po che lnga btum gyis sbas pa/ rim po chel shing ta kha rim pa 'dus ma ba de ma gnas pa'i byig na
14b2(1): kyang rab tu bde zhing sring ba/ grong khyer de'i cog par yang 'dzas bu'i chu klung gse las byas pa/ cog par de le 'i bam ma rin po che lI klu rnam pa lnga chog pa yod do// me tog raba'abras bu shin ba tu rgyas pa/ rlung myi drag pas
14b3(1): bskyod pa na/ sgra skang shin tu snyan pa ni/ ji skar lga'i rol mo phreng bu sta bya/ de na gnas pa'i phyi dag phyis bos na/ phul du byung ba la rab tu bde ba myong par 'gyur ro// 'obabs kyi nang na yang yongs su dag pa'i chu gsung
14b4(1): can bye du mya ba 'bra bas yongs su gang ngo // chu de dag la rin po che sna bdun gi gru yod do// gru/ de'i sem gyi ngag che zhing 'khrus byed do// gcig la gcig dga' zhi ba rab tu bdel ba myong ngo // gzhan yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshog
14b5(1): kyi bad mo ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad mo dang / bum da ri ka cheHbyang shing rta'i 'khod lo tsam skye'o// 'obabs kyi g.yas g.yon na skyed/ mo 'tshal mang du yod de/ skyed mo 'tshal re re li na yang chu myig dang bcas
14b6(1): ba'i rdzi bu snga wa yod do// rdzing bu de dag gi nang na yang me tog ud / sa dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da mi ka che khyang shing rta'i 'khor ro// tsam skyes ste/ brig su gan tu ma ngang pa rab tu ying du 'ong ba / chu ga ni da d+da tra
14b7(1): tu bsil zhing 'jam pa/ ngang pa dang / dud pa la sogs pa rkyal zhing rtse ba/ skyed mo 'tshal de na gzhan yang rin po che gzhal myed khang yod do// gzhal myed kha pa de re re yang chu zhe bkab par dpag tshad bzhi
14b8(1): yod do// gzhal myed khang de yir ba yang rin po che sna ba i las byas pa'o// 'di lta ste gser dang / dngul dang / bye tu d+ya dang / shel las byas te/ kha bar kyang gser las byas/ sa bzhi ni mu sa la gang ba blangs te/ gser
14b9(1): gyi bye mas bdal/ 2/ gzhal byed khang de'i drung na/ rin po che sna ba dum gi 'ba' chu dang / chu myig dang / rdzing bu yod de/ rdzi pa bu re re re la yang gser gyi tha ma skas bcwo brgyad yod do// chu shing yang 'dzam khu'i chu klung gi ser
14b10(1): las byas ste/ gsum bcu \u0f7f gsum gnas kyi skyed mo 'tshal rab tu bde ba can dang 'dra'o// grong khyer/ de re de yin na ya nga rgyal po rgya khri bzhi sto snyed yod do/ rgyal po de re de la yang btsun mo dang / pho brang slas grangs myed pa yod
15a1(1): kha 'o cheg ga ra 'de na 'a bgi man na 'a dang / che na pa pa mi yang byes cam tams bya bas gsal sa 'das pa'i namatha' ni sa 'das pa da po / pa
15a2(1): keng rgyal po re 'jus te/ theg pa can tha chub kyis sems pa rnams 'argyas te/ sa yang sems padas pa n-i/ thes pachen po'am 'a thethegs pas snga bri dang / 'ar ba dang / 'ding ba dang son
15a3(1): 'don pa dang / ci gang rnam pa de bzhin dunan tan du byed pa dang / shin du rgyas pa'i bar du byed do// de'i min byang chub ses par pa 'a sus rabag du byed pa des/ bdag gi lus sa sems dan ma byed pa kyid
15a4(1): bkod pa de yang / 'jig tes gi bdes pa banaban sa mams na 'dig dang/ kyi chung kyi dung 'jig rten thongs so/ de ba nyi gshegs pa ma po myo sogs pa yongs su byu na las 'ad 'i nas sna
15a5(1): del mi byang chub sems dpa 'a bus rabag tu byed pa byed chub na sa pa'i 'khom chad byed pa nyid kyi 'akor te / de/ du myirgyang 'bru 'job smran mas pa mcho bu'i mo bya cang byed bral rtso
15a6(1): dang / 'am thas gsung cas thogs te/ gang zhig la zhal gas de ga sungaga'i reg na/ kun na sa rtson mong pa'i drim gams sa pa ni gang 'byur po/ byang chub sems rapa 'di'i byin gyi rabs kying/ dkyis 'bor sems
15a7(1): kyi rdzu 'phrul de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal lus dpag tu myed pa ni lus chen po dpag tu myed pa// nam mkhal dang mnyam yas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma rtogs par gzhan gang yang
15a8(1): byang chub sems dpal de'i lus kyi mtha' shes par nus pa byed do// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpal yus dpag tu byed pa ma 'thob dang bcas pas/ mchod pa'i yo byad sdum pas ldag par bzhab pa te/ sangs rgyang
15a9(1): na par lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar sti stang du btsas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kha 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gtsug la zhugs lte ba'i slad du
15b1(1): mchod pa'i yo byad 'di dag pa zhes shig ces gsol da to// de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyend pas cad myi gsung pas pazhes su ma gnab nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu myed pa 'khor dang bcas te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// 
15b2(1): de bzhin du ldo nga nu ba dang byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu myed bgrangs myed pa snyed kyang / mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma pas ldag par bshams nas/ sangs rgyas ga phan par lpags nas/ 
15b3(1): phyogs gcig du 'khod pa li du rgyas par rig par bya'o// de'i tshe shing sa la zung gnyis kyi bar/ bsod nams kyi gzhi kra shis kyi gnas de kho khor yug tu/ dpag tshad gsum bcu lnga gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyis stong bcung zad kyang myed
15b4(1): bar yongs su bkang ngo // de'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas 'dus pa 'i byang chub sems dpal 'khor dang bcas te/ 'dug pa'i gnas ni smyung gi ye mo 'am/ khab kyi rtse mo tsam 'am/ rdul phra mo tsam mo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten/ 
15b5(1): mas chub tha rab nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning dang/ byang chub ses dadapal khams cas kyang tshus par rgya dang / ngas zhu gri ban pa'i 'thod thanas ca kyang 'tshus par rnang te// de sa gnyis mgan
15b6(1): mi 'od srung chen po dang dga' bo'o// rgyal po me skyes sgra 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sbrul gtug pa dang lhas pa tsam gyis 'chi bar byed/ ba dang / skur pa dang / Thag dug dang ldog pa 'i bar su sdig pacan ga las
15b7(1): gyokhyo pa rnam pa bcu drug po ma rtogs par/ gran mthums cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// srin po ram ta ba dang rna ma yin la sogs 'a thams cad kyis ljin ba'i bsams btang nas/ gcig la gcig byams shing zhug pa'i sems
15b8(1): skyed pa ni/ pha 'am ma 'am phu nu lta bur gyur pa to// stong gsum gi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khyams na/ gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang / gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems skyed de/ gcig ma rtogs 'dri log sred can
15b9(1): de'i tshe stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa bzhi thams cad 'jam par gyur da to// ngam grog dang / bye ma dang / gseg ma dang / rdo ba dang / shi be che/ ma can dang / rtsa gdug pa yang myed
15b10(1): par gyur te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan par ni/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas che dpag myed pa 'i 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe 'khor gi dkyil 'khor mang po thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i
16a1(1): ga mi chen gyi ya zab ca yi tudang 'di/ sna ma me dpa ba ba'inangs shA she gam sa ldang gatham // des dra ba'idi sheg sa ga nanas 'ad das bas na/  / 
16a2(1): mang sa sdang bar byas ma// de dag gi sus tu shing gi gyi sador bar gyis kyis gnas te/ byas byasam byings kyi rgong thugs 'o// de'is ma dang byi rang rdug yin lasogs pa 'kho rnams kyis sargyas kyi 'a la bya 'ang
16a3(1): thong thugs pa 'thong dang / bams ca 'jigs thab te/ lus kyi ba du kum yang gangs nas gnags sa 'dig du/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'od bye ba kyes/ sra bshugs pa 'di'i du byed pa rab byed byed pa pa 'di rte thob sa
16a4(1): mang ba kung mtshang nas ba sa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sas yin du nges so// kyi hud kyi hud de bzhin gshegs pas chang byed pa pazhi'i rdza zhugs btang nas/ ska dang byirnams kyi mchod pa yang bzhes su
16a5(1): gang ngo // de tham chad mi yi zhes bya ho sa nub par gyur/ tha byed dopa'i chos kyi sul bying ba sbyang to// kyi hung de thug 'dzin ten gi thug las chem pos gdung ba par gyu to// mas rnas
16a6(1): shing sa kham gi ltung gel snyen btsun pa zhes bya ba/ rigs mthun pa yi 'khor gru bsrung ba rnan gcig tu 'dus so des 'jig rten du bcas pa dag dgel ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phying 'or gi chum btab ras/ 'jug pa pa
16a7(1): langs te bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lda pas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gnas logs su phal mo sbyar/ mchi ma blags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la bye bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'as/ 
16a8(1): pa 'di skad ces lasol to/  ga bcom ldan 'das dge' slong gi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa ma bdag gcag gi mchod pa sam 'di bzhes su gsol/ de yang sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bskal pa'i slad du'o// t+yabacom ldan
16a9(1): 'das bdag gcag ni de bsam chad 'gon ma mchis skyabs ma mchis dpung gnyem ma mchis na tems mchis/ gnas ma mchis te/ !shin ku dbul po ngas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa khas blan chud pas chis pa'i dus kyi
16b1(1): tshogs tsam zhig gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thugs rtse ba'i slang du/ bdag gcag gi mchod pa tha a 'di bzhes nas/ gdod yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal rigs a ma~M/ bram ze la 'am// gdol/ 
16b2(1): pa yang rung / !dbul phongs pas yul gzhan du mchis te/ zhing gyi las la zhugs nas rmon pa 'dul ba dang / zhing yang gzhin las bzhi yang mnyam pa dang / gsegs dang ningag po yub ma mchis mang gub cang 'bal zhig pa re'o// 
16b3(1): bcom ldan 'das rmon pa 'dul zhes bgyi ba ni lus dang ngag gi las 'dul ba'i dpe'o// zhing gshin las bzhi mnyam zhes bgyi ba ni shes rab kyi dpe'o// gseg sa dang / zhing po yur ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa'i dpe'o// bcom
16b4(1): ldan 'das bdag la spang rmong ba 'dul ba dang / zhing gshi nad pa yang mchis la zhing gi lo yum ma lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi char 'ba' zhig la re'o// bye/ rigs dbul po bzhi ni bdag lags te/ bdag ni
16b5(1): bla na myed pa'i chos kyi rin po ches dbul te/ 'phongs mthugs me ba'i slad du bdag gi dbul 'phongs pa'i sdug sngal gsal zhing / sdug snga lta 'o dgis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems ca mtshar ma mchis pa bsgral du bsol
16b6(1): bdag gcag gi mchod pa 'di shi nang tu chung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhinagashegs pa 'i 'khor mang po kun gyis bsod snyoms su 'chal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gcag la 'gon ma mchis/ skyabs ma mchis
16b7(1): dpung gnyen ma mchis na/ sgra gcan 'dzin lta bur thugs che bar dgongs su gsol// de nas bcom ldam 'das thams cad mkhyend pa blan myed pa tul zhing kha lo sgyur pas btsun da la 'di skad ces smras so// 
16b8(1): legs so/ legs so// ngas khyod kyi dbul 'phongs pa myed pa dang / bla na myed pa'i char khyed la dbab cing / chos kyi myu gu skye bar bya'o// khyod ni da ltar ched pa mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / bogs pa myed pa'i so'o// 
16b9(1): yang dag par shes par 'dod de/ ngas khyod la che dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bdel ba dang / thogs pa byed pa'i so so ya phradag par shes pa rtag tu sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun da zas kyi sbyin pa byin pas khyang par
16b10(1): myed pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro// gnyis gang zhe ni/ bzhes nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa dang / bzhes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'o// ngas khyed kyi
17a1(1): dod pas kyis ba banas ba/ cad pa byin pa'i sa sa ci dag pa sa gathogs pamaca/ das bcan sa sam ga bas
17a2(1): babyed pa'i mas brnam pa nyis byung bdun ma ma'o// mas kyi mde 'bagasab thung ba zhes/  byin pa bam pan mangs pa yanga' ba na mab pa gyis pa skye
17a3(1): sa kyang / sem sa can gi sbyin pa mim sa tu byin du pa rdzogs par 'bye ba nga ma lags pa/ byim pa sbyin pa'i mad kyis bzhes 'dzi nyam mongs pa yang ma marargyangangs/ 'ams cang ma byed paci gshes kyang shos brjon don / 
17a4(1): sems can gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba lags na/ phyin pa 'ang blangs pa ni sems can no/  sbyin pa phyis pa zhes pa mi rnga'i lnga'o// byin pa thar blangs pa ni
17a5(1): dang 'dres pa'i lus nyon 'ongs pa dang bcas pa'i lus/ thamasas/ ke sa kyi nyes pa'i lus so// sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni/ nyom mongs pa ma mchis pa 'i ni/ ro rje b+ha bu'i chos kyi thun tad
17a6(1): tha/ mabalams pa'i skulags na/  thongs sbyin paras sa kyi 'bras bu kyang byangs nis 'i sa gzung / tin sa ba ni/ byin pal 'ayobs byed pa 'ongs su thogs pasakyi
17a7(1): ba nas/ shes rab kyi ma rong du byin du lale bar su rdzog labar phyi dbyar te/ sha'i phyag 'bal ni ga thob kyi / sangs rgyab kyi yun gyi 'og las du byang mi shes kyi bya gi bamadu thob ma bsanama'o// phyir 'atus pa
17a8(1): @pa ste/ khyim pa li pha rol tu phyin pa pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ shes rab kyis rol tu phyind pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi khyam dang ldan pa nas 'a shes rab kyi khya gi bar du ldam pa lags r+b+ba/ ci'i sla
17a9(1): du sbyin pa rnam gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par mchis zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni blangs ma thag tu sngam 'tshal nas nas/ de ma thag tu zhubs che dang / mdog dang / stob pa dang / bde ba dang / 
17a10(1): so so yang dag par shes pa thob pa lags so// sbyin pa byis pa zhes pa ni gsol pa dang / zhu ba ya ma ma mchis/ pas/ 'bras bu rnam pa lnga po yangs mchis na / ji'i skad du sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu
17b1(1): khyad par ma mchis zhes gsungs// bcom ldam 'das kyis bkalas \u0f7flang ba/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni skal pa chad byed pa mthal yas pa grangs myed pa'i bar du zas sa ma nyon mongs pa 'amyu gcas pa'i sku a yin// nang kyi/ 
17b2(1): tha ma'i sku ma yin te/ rtag pa'i sku chos kyi sku rdo rje'i sku'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma mthong ba ni/ nyon mongs pa'i lu sa zag pa dang bcas pa'i lus/ nang gi tha ma'i lus so// byang chub sems dang
17b3(1): de'i tshe yod snyoms pazhes nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
17b4(1): sangs rgyas te/ de bas na sbyin pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad bar myed do zhes sangs rgyas gsung ngo // byang chub sems dpal thog ma yang bdu de bzhi bcom la/ mya ngan las 'das kar yang bdud bzhi bcom pa de bas na// sbyin pa
17b5(1): rnam pa gnyis kyi khyad par myed do zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems/ sra dpal de'i tshe ma mdo sde bcu gnyis rgyas par gsungs mod kyi/ thams cad sngar thugs su chud la/ mya ngan las 'das kar sems can rnams
17b6(1): la rgyas par phye zhing stand pas/ de bas na sbyin pa rnam gnyis la/ khyad par myed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yi sku ni// skal pa tshad myed grangs myed pa'i bar du bsod snyoms myi ga so la mod kyi
17b7(1): nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ce ba gsungs te/ sngan de bzhin gshegs pas gnag rdzi mo nam ta dang / nam ta la la gnyis kyis lo ma'i 'jams phul ba bzhes nas/ bzod bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byag
17b8(1): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// pa ni yang dag par bshos myi gsol te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gi phyir/ khyed kyi mchod pa tha a/ 'di bzhes mod kyi/ yang dag par na gsol ba myed do// de'i tshe na 'khor
17b9(1): gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun da'i mchod pa de rnams bzhes pa mthong nas/ thams cad dge la mgu' rangs te/ skad mthun pas btsun da la legs so shi nad tu khegs so zhes smras ste// / khyod kyi myang
17b10(1): thog tu bab bo// btsun da zhes bya ba ni don dam pa la mkhas pa ste/ khyed kyis kyang de 'dir don chen po nyams pas de bas na/ don las mying btsun da zhes btags te/ khyod kyis ni tshe 'di nyid la grags pa dang / phan pa'i don
18a1(1): ga gachen mazab cing ljon pa yang yongs su 'ogs pa bgyung te/ mcha ma brgyan pakyi'i nang du byes kyang than byed pa'i bde bzhin du brnyed dka' ba tha ma/ dmigs so lu dang / matog tu tu
18a2(1): kapa las 'jig rten du shin tu dgon 'the/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa yang ginib tu dkal la/ sangs rgyas dang phrang nab dang bskyes pa la bzhin dung dka'/ chos los pa yang zhin kyang ka'/ zangs rgyas mdzas cu
18a3(1): mya ngan las 'das kar 'chong ba bshams te phul ba yang shinab tu dka'o// btsum da la phyag 'tshal lo/ btsum nga la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs te/ ston kyi ches bcol lnga'i
18a4(1): zla ba lta nga rgyas shing yongs su dag la/ srin nam na bun gisachong na thams cad kyis lta ba dang 'dra bar/ khyod kyang de dang 'dra b.rabadag gcag la sogs pas shi nang tu lta bar gyur pa to// khyed kyi mchod pa nang gyi
18a5(1): 'a ma 'di bzhes pas/ khyod sbyin pa'i 'a rog tu phyin bayod shes su rdzogs par gyur te/ bcun pakhyod la phyag 'tshags so/ de bas ma byod mi zlab yongs su rgyas pa dang 'dra ste/ sems can thams cad
18a6(1): kyang byis pa byed do// btsun pa khyod la phyag 'amab yodagyi li sum thob kyang blangs rgyas kyi lugs dang 'dra 'as/ bcu na da khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi sram yang dag pa ste/ bla gcam 'dzin dab byid na
18a7(1): de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams kyis tshigs su gcad de smras pa// phyi'i nang du khyod skyes pa// drug po lnga las shi na tu 'phags/ bdag gcag 'khor rnams thams cad kyis// khyod la phyag 'tshal gsol pa
18a8(1): 'debs// mye'i skyes bu khru mchog ni/ yongs su mya ngan 'das zhes gsung // bdag gcag rnams la snying che'i phyir// sangs rgyas bzhugs par gsol ba thob// yum tu 'jig rten 'dib bzhugs shing ka
18a9(1): tshad byed 'khor la kham pa'i phyir// mkhas pa rnams kyis lpags pa'i/ na bla byed chos mchog bshad du gsol / khyod kyis gsol ba sa btab na// bdag gcag rnams mi rgya mtsho'o// de bsdu khyed kyis
18a10(1): gsol ba thob pa kha lo sgyur ba'i ston pa la// de tshe btsu ma shi nang tu dga'// mgul rangs pa ni// dper na myi zhig pa ma shi pa la so sa pa tsam tu/ btsu med// yeng shi nad tu dga' ba m+b+ha sa dang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
18b1(1): zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nasapatshigs su gced pa 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so bde ba'i don tu gyur da/ myi'i lus kyang legs par thob/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsald/ !/ de na so gsum yang
18b2(1): yongs su spangs/ !/ legs so bde ba'i don gyu rang te// rIn cen gser ge ri mthong nas/ sa/ ston pa kha/ lo sgyur dang 'ja yang // byol yongs khams su skye myi thogs// / sangs rgyas u zhum pa ra wAr// phrang ba'i tusi kyang
18b3(1): shi na tu dka'// phrad nas dgel pa'i ma pa skyed// yi dgas sdug sdel yongs su bcom// gzhan yang yongs su bcom pa ni/ lha ma yin gi rigs rnams te// khab khyer yungs kar kha zer ba bas// sangs rgyas
18b4(1): 'byung ba de las dka'// bdag ni sbyin pa yongs rdzogs te// lha dang myi'i rgyud las za dang // 'jig rten chos kyis ma gos pas// pad mo chus myi chags bzhin/ srid pa'i bar du legs par spangs// 
18b5(1): 'khor ba'i rgyun las yongs su grol// mya li lus thob shin tud dka'/ sangs rgyas 'byung dang phra bar dka'/ tsi ltar rgya mtshog chen po li nang / ru sbal long ba byung ba de/ shin gi bu gang 'go 'chung bzhin
18b6(1): sangs rgyas byon ba de bas dka'/ bdag gi mchod pa gsol/ pa 'di/ bla myed 'bras bu thob ba sbron/ kun gyi nyon cha/ ngas khams cang ni/ snying po byed pas thams cad bcom/ bdag ming sa
18b7(1): 'di nyid na/ lha dang byi'i lus byire/ ji ste thob par gyur pa me yang / de le dag la 'as mos pa byed/ bcom ldan bdag gi mchod pa ba zhes pas gi nang tu dga' ba dpag ma mchis/ e ram ta'i me tog la
18b8(1): btsan dan bzang po'i dri 'byung bzhin/ bdag ni I ram 'dra ba ste/ bcom ldan pa dag gi mchod pa zhes pas/ btsam dam bzang po'i gsung dang bzhim/ de bas bdag ni shi nad tu dka'/ bdag ni 'bras bu mngon tu thob
18b9(1): blazlabla myed mchog mi gnas phyin te/ tshangs pa brgya byin lnga rnams kyang / rnags nas bdag la mchod pa bgyid/ 'jig rten bcas pa thams cad ni/ sdug sngal chen po byang ma skyes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
18b10(1): yongs u mya dam 'das zhes rtogs/ thams cad ma bum par skad chen pos/ 'jig rten kha lo sgyur ba myed/ sems cam thams cad myi spong zhing / sras dang 'dra bar bzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan dge 'dun 'khor
19a1(1): 'khor rnas la/ bla ma byed pa chos stonang pa/ mi tha rgya mtsho la che'i dbus/ rimache mir ba snang bar gyu dang / bcom ldam ye shes yongs 'chor ba/ sa rig pa'i yum pa ste/ bris panam mkha' ba bsda la
19a2(1): khrom tshong yongs su gsol ba bzhid/ bcom ldan yongs su gsel ba ni/ kum nas nyom mangs mams cad de/ mi nyid nyis shang nas su/ sprin byed kun tu snang ba bzhin/ de gang 'ams can de dag ni/ gning tu ngu bab gyi
19a3(1): kyang blangs/ tham pa cad la ngom par 'khor ba'i/ phrug sngal 'bab chug yengs pa'i 'gyur/ de ba ba yang ba rgyal bcom ldan 'das/ 'gro ba'i dad pa skyed pa dang / 'khor pa'i sdug dus gcang ba'i phying na 'jig rten yul du bzhugs bu
19a4(1): gzob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun da la bka' ba lang ba/ de de bzhin de de bzhin no// khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin te/ sangs rgyal 'thom rang ldam 'das 'jig rten du gshes sa ba zhi nang tu dka' ba mi/ me tog tu
19a5(1): num pa dang 'dra'o// sangs rgyas dang phrad nas dang ba skye ba la bzhin/ tu dka'o// sangs rgyas yongs su myang nasas 'dag dang// mchong pa dbul ba yang 'azhes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin dpa
19a6(1): mongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yang de bas zhinang tu dka' ste/ btsum nga rkyo mya ngan ma byed par shi nang tu dga' bas bdag spro ba skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas mchong pa nang gi lam 'di bzhes pa ste/  sbyin pa'i 'jon
19a7(1): tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par gyurang pas mchog gyis/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na yun tu bzhugs par gsol lam 'debs shig/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul thams cad myi rtag la/ 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang / 
19a8(1): de'i drul tu rig par gyis shig/ de das btsum da la tshigs su gcad de bka' mal dab/ 'jigarten pacas 'a bams kyang de/ skye ba yong ma 'chi ba yod/ che lo grangs byed thub pa yang / ba ma yang bar rig par bya'o// dang
19a9(1): yod na rgud ba yod/ 'du ba yod na bral bar 'gyur/ yang 'tshol de yang byi rtag ste/ dngang ba'i mdog kyang nad kyis 'phrog 'cho pa'i tshe yang mchil pas 'phrog rtag pa'i chos kyang gang yang byed/ dbrang du byung sapa
19a10(1): rgyal po dag byin dang mthul spobs bla byed kyang / thams cad 'byung ba zhis 'pho bas na/ 'chol ba'i srog kyang de bzhin no// sdug sngag 'khor lo ma pa' byed de/ 'khor bar 'khor ba rgyan gyi cha ga khams gsu 'ams kyacang dag pa byed
19b1(1): bya ste/ kyang de la ni rgyal pos kyang gnang la// bya dag la yang gzhan las lpags par sartsal to// gyang des mya stong thub ces bya ba yang / kyang des stobs 'ba' zhig gis thub pa ma yin gyi/ phal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyi stong lam
19b2(1): phul tu gyur pa bas na/ stong thub pa'i gyad ces gdags so// de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / phung po'i bdud dang / lnga'i bu'i bdud dang / mchil ba dag gi bdud yongs su bcom nas/ de las
19b3(1): mde bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum maphul du gyungang ba zhes gsungs te/ ci ltar kyang gcig gis kyi stong thub pa bzhin no// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid rnam pa sna tshogs kyi yon tan chang myed pa dang ldan pas na/ de bzhin
19b4(1): gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes gdags so// 'jam dpal rnam par rtog pas de bzhin gshegs pa la/ 'du byed rnams dang mthun mo zhes rnam par rtog par myi rigs so// dper na khyam bdag phyug po zhig
19b5(1): bu khye'u zhig btsas nas/ mtshan mkhan kas ltas te/ tshe mthung po zhes dpyad rnam pha mas/ de skad thos ma thag tu rigs mtshol bar myi 'gyur bar shes nas de la myi lkug par myi byed de/ pha tsam gyi tshong du 'dzind to// gang tshe
19b6(1): zung ba de la ni dge'i sbyong ngam/ bram ze la sogs pa'i khyi'u dang bu mo yinas/ bar du btsun par myi byed do// ci ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa yanga'adu byed rnams dang mthun na lta ga 'jig rten du bcas pa lnga dang myi dang
19b7(1): sems can thams cad kyis btsum par myi byed do// de bzhin gshegs paHgsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'gyur gyi go pa ya ba 'dzi nad pa myed par 'gyur ro// de bas ma 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa
19b8(1): pa 'du byed rnams dang mthun no zhes gsungs pa'i mya rigs so// 'jam dpal dper na bur myed dbul mo gnas myed pa rten myed pa skyabs myed pa/ nad kyis kyang zin da la/ zas dang skom gis kyang 'phongs la/ khyam zhing 'gro ba
19b9(1): bcig gyi khyim cu phyin nas bu btsas ma khyim bdag des 'dug tu myi ster to/  slong rdo bud myed de bu bcas nas ring po ma loms pa/ gung ba du logs te yul gzhan du b+ha las/ la ma du chung ngadang chang dang / lpags pas nyon
19b10(1): mongs la/ sbrang bu dang she sbrang dang sbrul gdug pa dang phrad ngam/ lam gyi bar du chu klu pag pa 'gas chod kyang nga / chu klung shi na tu zab cing drag po de las bu lang du blangs te/ 'bog go// de nas ma smang gnyis kaM chu lin padu nu bo
21a1(1): de ltar bung myed de bu la byams shing thug par bsams pa'i bsod nams kyis /  shi ma thag tu tshangs pa'i ltar skyes so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu dag pa de ma'i chos srung ba 'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jun
21a2(1): byed rnams dang gyi mthun no zhes brjod par gyi bya'o// bdag mi ga ti mug gso gdongs pas shes rab kyi myig byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngas pa mchos mi bsams kyis kyi khyab pas kyi rtogs te/ de bas me bzhin gshegs
21a3(1): khani ba zer 'dus bya ba zhe 'am/ nges par 'du ba ma byas zhes brjod par phye bya'o// gang yang dag par lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes marjod par gyi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can
21a4(1): cang kyi dashe' bar byudang ba'i chos byed cing/ 'gro ba mang pos sugs rtse ba'i phying ngo // ji ltar bud byed dbul mo de krung 'ga' yan las rna bu byas ra bar bapa las te sub dang srog kyang las bar byungang ba dang / 'dral b.rig de
21a5(1): kyi thu rtsa ba thung ba'i bya brgyab sems dpa' yang de bzhin du lus pa/ srog labab kyi bar d+ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas rang sa blan zhe'am/ de bzhi gshegs pa pa 'dus ma byab dang sus
21a6(1): nes brjod par gyi bya'o// de sang de bzhin gshegs pa 'dubyas pa dang / mthun mo nis brjod pas tha ma byed pa yangs bar thogs pa'i bya chub tu 'byung ba ni jithar bung byed dgra rje
21a7(1): ma pa'i na skyes pa pa'i spyod/ de ci'i phyi zhe / chom srung ba'i byung // de ga zung ba gang med/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus pa byas pa'o zhes smra te/ rigs kyi sku ba ma se sa 'a stos pas byin
21a8(1): grong kyin rjem par thos pa 'ang ba'i ste/ cis bung byed dbul po mang pa'i lda myi'i sod kyi/ tshangs pa'i sna ba byes so// 'ang ma dpal 'di sa ste dbar na/ myi zhig lam ring por 'dron du so pa sa sa na lam
21a9(1): tshums ca des na du kyis rgya nyas nyas 'a las de'i kyis du bye bya te/ rab tu 'jigs skrag ma ltas du ba na ni gdos gyi bar mchis thal bamam mas/ bres ni thos pa dang chung 'i ma nas kyi
21a10(1): rko'i so// der che 'pho sa nas gsum bcu phra gsum gnas ki wang skyes so/ de nas yang kham brgya bcu'i bar du tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal por skyes s+ho / de nas 'dra'o rgya stong char bar bya'i rnying du 'thor lo sbyang na
21b1(1): rgyal por skyes tegs ga gzhag len ma sur na long ga sum du ma gyes kyin gong nas gong lu ba tu bdel pa'i gnas su skyes so/ 5gA ga de las ma 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu dag khrel zhing po tsha ba dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa
21b2(1): 'dus byas rnams dang mthun par myi lta'o// 'jam dpal mu stegs can ngan par lta ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas dang mthun no// zhes smra ba'i tshul khrims srung ba'i dge' slong dag ni/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la
21b3(1): dus byas pa yin par myi lta'o// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byaso zhes brjod ma/ de ni rdzun tu smra ba yin te/ ga ba zag de ni shi ma thag tu sems can dmyal rig bar bya ba ni/ ci ltar ga pa zag pa dag gi khyim ma gnas pa bzhin no//
