194b4(1): na 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ltar/ yongs su mya ngas las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di sa pa gi snying po// skam mchog tu gyu rang / phul tu gyur te/ gang zhig gyi gzungs nan dan pa par byang bar 'gyur/ sman thams
194b5(1): ca kyin patu lang bkrag zhes gzungs 'thos nas ba sprug tu kyang to// gang mdorje 'di kyi nyan cing kyi 'dad ne ni tu ying gte mug che ba ste ga dgel bakhri mas sa la par
194b6(1): 'tshal dato// bcom ldan 'das khadag ni pags pa la shus te i ge 'dri ba lel zhing byal ya/ thag+sa gyung te lngag char gyab/ dang // rkang phrung nye chus phya ba dang / rus la la nog sa ste sbu lu
194b7(1): byal / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa le mdo sde 'di bzod do// bris nas kyang klog pa dang / 'don la dang / khong du chu par bya ba dang / gzhan la rgya cher nyon 'jam
194b8(1): bzod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can gang zhig longs 'apyod la chags par gyur nga na/ bdag gis de la sngar longs 'byor byin te/ de la 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'i chen po'i mdo sde 'di smon
194b9(1): bar bskul lo// gal te longs 'apyod chen po dang ldan pa zhig na/ sngar yid la 'dod pa'i gtam snyan pa byas te/ de yi 'og tu theg pa chen po yongs su byangan las 'das pa'i pado sde 'di klog par skul / 
194b10(1): gal te ya rabs zhig na yang mthus nam tan gis klog tu bzhug go// gal te brgyal zhig na yang / bdag gis snga bzhin tu g.yog byas te// shi nad tu dgal zhib mgul bar byas la/ de'i 'og tu yong pa su
195a1(1): mya ngan khas 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di stond to// kal te sha nad tu rgyas pa 'i mdo la sde la U rapa ba zhig mchis ma/ mthul stobs kyis 'dul bar 'tshal lo// btul nas de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngam khan
195a2(1): 'das pa'i khado'i sde klog tu bzhug go// gal te theg pa chen po'i mdo' sde la dang ci mos pa zhig na/ bdag de'i drung du mchis te shi napa tu sti steng dang bcas par rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang/ mchod pa dang stod 'a bgyi
195a3(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la ba ka las mkha pa/ legs so legs so// khyod theg pa chen po yi mdol sde la shi na tu mos pa dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la shin tu dga' ba dang / theg pa/ 
195a4(1): chen po'i mdo sde la 'dod pa dang / theg pa chen po 'i mdo sde la dag lapa dang / theg pa chen po le dad pa dang / sti sta dang bkur sti dang / mchod pa byed pa legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
195a5(1): ci ltar shin tu dgel ba'i sems 'di'i rgyu 'di'i rkyen kyis/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po ched myed mtha' / yas la klu bag pa 'ga'i bye ma snyed khas shin tu 'phags ste
195a6(1): me dag las snga nga bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pam 'tshang rgya'o// khyod ni ring lo myi thogs la khyod kyi dkyil 'khoms pa po la/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
195a7(1): pa 'i mdo sde/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dgongs te/ gsungs pa'i snying po ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma mra shar pa de'i tshe de na
195a8(1): dus na/ pa bram zer gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'amya ba 'gyod pa na/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi mu stegs can ga yug lag khams cad kyang khong du chud de rab tu zhi bar 'apyod cing 'khyod la me dpa lda
195a9(1): sems yongs u dag pas pha rol kyi rkyend kyis/ 'dod pa li 'du shes mya skye ste/ zhe sdang gi me/ bsad na sat+te/ rtag pa dang bde ba dang / bdag dang yongs su dag pa'i chos yid la gzu pa ste/ phyogs khams
195a10(1): cad du theg pa chen po 'i mdol sde 'tshal kyang shin tu rgyas pa'i bying tsama? ya pra ma thos so// pa de'i tshe ga das kyi pi zhig la/ gnas te/ ri de shin tu dben pa/ chu dmyig dpa' bab chu dang khrus kyi rdzi bu dang skye zhi
195b1(1): nags tshal dang / ci shing gis yongs su gang ste/ gnas de 'i bar bar na brag las chu myig gtsa pa ma 'ab ba ste/ mye tog/ gsung can gis/ yongs u brgyan pa la/ bya dang ri dgas kyang dpag tu myed do// de na shi nang tu mo dang wan/ 
195b2(1): ba li 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa wa dad pa yang dpag tu myed la// gzham ya ba bar ma'i ya pa dang /  ba ma dam po dang / shing sngon poli ram pa/ gsung can gis yongs su gang ngo / pa de'i tshe de'i dus na gcig pu khe na gnas te
195b3(1): shing gi 'bras bu 'ba' shig pa'o// zos nas sems che gcig tu ting nge 'dzin pa yid la byed don rdza po ched byed pa'i bar bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ro// zhes kyang 'khos khra/ theg pa chen po ma ngam
195b4(1): sde'i mying yang ma thos so// rigs kyi bungs de ltar dka' thub 'aspyod pa na/ brgya byin lha li dbang po dang / b+ha yibu rnams shind tu ngo tshar du gyur te/ 'dus nas so so nas 'di snyam du gyur te// tshigs su
195b5(1): cang pa 'od rnam 'o// ga la nig ni 'di ga ces/ nadag gangs kyi mi 'dil// dag ni 'ad chags sangs pab / yon tan rgyan pa'i rgya mtsho'o// 'dod chags sa dzang/ #
195b6(1): brgyal spangs/ gti mug g.yol sgyu yongs su gcad/ rag gyi sgo nas mya smra ba/ rtsub cing klang ba'i tshig rnams so// / de'i tshe 'khor de 'i nang na lga 'i sras po rab tu dka' ba zhes bya ba
195b7(1): ni ga gis/ yang tshigs su gcad de smras pa/ de ltar nga 'dod chag sa spangs nas su/ yongs dka' ba rtson 'grus rab brtson pa rgya byin lha'i thabs 'dod dam/ da lta'i gnas su skye bar 'dod
195b8(1): ci ste mu stegs can yin na/ shi nad tu dka la thub 'byod pa 'di/ brgya byin lha li dbang po li/ dab pa dang tha bA/ dag tshol phyir ro// de'i tshe na gzhan yang lga'i sras mo// nang drang srong gcig ces bya bas/ brgya byin la tshigs
195b9(1): su gcad de/ sgrol ba// lha'i dbang po ke'u shi ka/ de ltar the tsom skyed myi rigs// mu stegs dka' thub pyod pa yu pa/ brgya byin dbang po'i thabs myi 'chol/  tshigs su gcad pa de skad ces smras nas
195b10(1): yang 'di skad ces gsol to// ke'u shi ka 'jig rten na skyes bu chen po/ dag ni/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir phyi/ bdag gi lus la chags pa 'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la phan pa dang bla de la bya'i don gyi phyir
196a1(1): dka' thub chad byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'byod do// skyes bu de ni 'khor ba'i skyon mang po mthong bas/ ci ste sa chen po 'di dang / mi dang rgya mtsho la cheni por rin po ches yongs su gang bar ma 'ongs pa/ mchil a / 
196a2(1): ngar snabs ltar chags pa myi skyed do// de ltar skyes bu chen po de rin po che dang / longs 'apyod dang / chung ma dang / yu dang / mgol dang / myig dang / glad pa dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag dang / gnas pa'i
196a3(1): khang khyim dang / bam tha ba dang / rta dang theg pa dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa'i khyi yang yongs su spangs te/ ma tho 'dis kyi zha skye la gyi sngon gyi/ sems can sa pam pa dpabade 'kho na tu'ab la zhig spyom
196a4(1): bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ skyes bu chen po der ni yongs su dag cing / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su bcad ske nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa li 'bala' shig 'chol lo/ 
196a5(1): brgya byin lnga yi dbang pos kyang 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyisaspras yang ltar dang / drang srong chen pa de 'jig rten dang bcas ba lams cad kyi skyabs su 'gyur ba yin la/ ji ste 'jig rten
196a6(1): 'din yang ba rgyas kyi zhing chen po byung na/ 'jig rten du bcas pa ni dang gyi dang / rna ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa lo spro'i gdug pa gsel bar 'gyur te/ sems can de dag sangs rgyas rgya ts+tsha/ 
196a7(1): shing ki grib ma/ 'dug yas/ nyon mongs pa gdug pa thams n+naR+Ya ga s+ye khyad par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bde bar gshegs par gyur na// lha/ bdag cag la sogs pa thams cad kyang
196a8(1): shin tu 'bar la yi nyon mongs pa dgag tu myed pa zhi bar 'gyur te/ de ni shin tu ya ma yid ches par dga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can chad myed brgya stong skyed/ bla na byed la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu le
196a9(1): byed par 'gyur la// rkyen cung zad cas kyis tha na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyin gyi ldog par gyur te/ dbed na tu lig ba ltar mu 'gul na/ tha la lang 'grug pa yang 'dra'o// yang dbem na'i tho brin
196a10(1): pa spu gzugs dang 'dra ste/ bya ba ni dka' la zhig pa ni u pa ltar byang chub sems kyang de dang 'dra ste/ bskyed ni dkal la lkog ni sla'o// drang sro chen po dper na gyi bang po zhig/ go mtshon de bzhin su chas
196b1(1): g.yul ros phyin nas/ dgra nga grangs pag tu 'jigs nas phyir ldog pa dang 'dra bas/ sems can pas sa cad kyang de dang 'dra bar/ byang chub tu ses pa skyed pa mig mtshon gis yongs su brgyan nas/ 'thong ba'i spyonas zaT
196b2(1): ma thag tu 'jigs pa skyes nas/ phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// de bas na sangs rgyas skyes bu de nyon mongs pa dang / gdung ba byed par dkal ba 'askyod de/ spyod pa yongs su dag par 'tho thod kyi/ 'on kyang yid khyi ches kyi
196b3(1): de'irigs cu nye bar so la/ skyes bu de bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub phrag pa la bkur chus las kyi nus pa btags nganam mo// dben na shing nya la yang lo gnyis yod na khyad du chung la dang / bya la 'dag
196b4(1): ma gnyim yod na phur zhes pa dang 'dra bar/ dka' thub pyod pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ shin tu tshul khrims sdom par ni/ ngas kyang mthong na// shin ba tubab mo'i ye shes yor dam byed pa brtag na ma/ ci steg ning cu
196b5(1): rnatha' bzhe pa dang/ than bye pa ya nan par rdzogs pa byang chub kyi khye kyil zas las khye nus so// drang srong sa na nya mos bu ma gas buni rtag tu 'ang ma ci/ zabs kyi
196b6(1): ni nung ngo ro// dper na ni sa 'bra yang me tog shin da tu yang ya 'bras bur 'gyur bzung ngo // sel sa tsam bya btub tu sos/ skyed pa yang dad byed mod kyi/ tham 'bras bu 'gyur bzhin
196b7(1): tu yang cu nga // dra phreng chen po bdag cag 'grogs te/ skyebu re gan par rtag tu dadang // drang srapa dper na gser pa pa yang / nas gsus gi sgonas btags na/ 
196b8(1): ba yin na pa ma yin btags so// 'dris ste grags pa dang / gzungs pa dang / bdang ba'i nan brtag pa'o// dka' bus khyod 'i yang da pa 'dra'o// zhes smras nas/ de'i sab rgya byin rnam bapa
196b9(1): bdag kyi lus srin po la lus shin tu 'jigs su rung pa zhig tu smras nas/ gangs kyi ri las babs te/ gcang yang myi ring ba zhig na 'dugs nas/ de'i ma srin po'i yang gyi 'jigs pa 'i sems / shin

197a1(1): bcod pa byed phre 'di smras nas/ de'i drung tu 'dug ste/ sha nad tu 'jigs su dung ba li gzugs mngon par stan nas// myig dgrad do// phyogs bzhi kun tu ltas so// de'i tshe dka' thub 'byod pa'i tshigs su khecad/ 
197a2(1): pa phyed po 'di thos nas// rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes pa ni/ dper na chod shin tu nyam pa pa li ka ya sar mtshan mo song ngo // sod pa las// grogs stor nas shi nad tu 'jigs te// grogs b+hU nas grogs dang phrad pa tsam
197a3(1): du shi na tu dga' mgul rangs pa tshad myed pa skyes so// gzhan yang dper na nad yun ring pos btab la zhig/ sman ga mkhas pa dpa' phrad de// sman bzang pos bsos pa tsa ma 'am/ dper na rgya mtshod ltung ba
197a4(1): las// gzings dang phrad pa tsam 'am/ shi nad tu skom gyis gdungasapa zhig chu grang mo dang phrad pa tsam 'am/ smras pasad pa las shor ba tsam 'am/ yun ring por btson du bzung ba las thar
197a5(1): pa tsam 'am/ zhing pa zan chen grub pa las char pa 'bab 'o// tsam 'am/ 'dron po kham ring 'or 'dron du yo 'i phyira'akhor ba tsam du tho ba nas/ shi nad tu dgal ba chen po skyes so

197a10(1): sems can mang po nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzar ba las// nad gsol ba'i skam par gyu da te/ sman mkhas par gyur pa pa 'di u yin/ tshigs su bcad pa phyed po 'di smras pas bdag gi sems skul te
197b1(1): ji ltar zla ba phyed pos khar ma khags kyis bye ba ltar gyur de to zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan mi yang ma mthor gyi/ srin po 'ba' zhig mthong bas yang 'di snyam du sems par gyur / 
197b2(1): yang 'di snyam du bsams te 'dis smras pa ni ma yin pa snyam/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byad gzugs shin pa tu myi sdug la/ gzugs su rung ba ni 'di lta bur myi 'byung ba'i phyir ro// ga gis tsha

197b4(1): bye'i nang nas par no skye gyi srid la/ nyi mas gdungs pa'i 'od las// chu grang mo khyud gyi srid snyam sems par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu pa ya ba de'i tshe na 'di snyam khu/ bdag ni sha nad tu shes kha byed pa ste

197b6(1): nas/ srin po de la snyen te 'di skad ces/ smras so// legs/ so skyes bu chen po khyod sngon 'anges pa li 'jigs pa dang / bral bas/ gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa khyed po 'di su

197b8(1): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad yang dag pa'i lam yin te/ 'jig rten na gnas pa'i sems cam tshad myed pa ni rtag tu lta ba'i dra bas kun tu klags khas na/ nam du yang mu stegs

197b10(1): 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze chen po khyod pa la 'di skad ma dris shi ka/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ kho bo zas ma rnyed nas// gzhag ma padu lon te gnas kun tu khatsal kyang ma rnyed pas// bkres pa dang skom/

198a8(1): yang sbas / kho bo was su ni bya'i sha rjend pa dang // khrag dron po thub ste/ kho bo ni bsod na pas chung bas/ zas su ni 'di lta bu ma ya gnas thams cad sa snyed do// 'jig rten na phyi ga shin tu
198a9(1): mang mo kyi/ thams cad 'asod nams rang ldan pa ga stag la// rdzas kyi thung bas na/ bdag ni de dag 'asod ning ma kha li mthul byed do zhes smras so// 8/ rigs kyi phung sa de la 'di skad ces rnas la

198b5(1): po che lnga bdud gi sdod dang brjes pa dang 'dra bar/ bdag kyang rnyi zo khyer pa 'i lus 'dis/ rdo rje lta bu'i khrus kho ba kha dbyar na/ 'di skad ces sbab la/ 'di la su sa yid ches khar#

198b7(1): zhan yang byang chub sems dpal 'phrul gi myig can/ sems can tshad myed pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don kyi phyir theg pa chen po nan tam byed cing pha/ rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa yang dbang
198b8(1): du 'gyur ro// de ma yin pa gzhan ya pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na bstar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// da ltar sems can gyi don tu 'tsho zhing skyong pa rnams kyang / bdag gi dbang du gyur da ti/ bdag
198b9(1): ni yi ge 'bru brgyad po'i phyir/ lu sa 'di yongs su gtong ngo // srin po sa ya pa smras pa/ ci ste/ de lta bur yang dag par gtor phod na// shin da tu legs par nyon cig/ tshigs u bcad pa 'di yang sten par bya'o// rigs kyi bungs
198b10(1): de'i tshe de skad ces thos nas// sems rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ lus la gyon pa 'ig pags kyi gos phud nas// srin po'i stan tu bting te/ slob dpon gang la bzhugs zhes smras nas// thal mo sbyar te byas mo sa la bcugs nas/ 
199a1(1): 'di skad ces smras so// slob dpon padag la tshigs su bcad pa/ phyed po/ 'di stan tu gsol ba zhes/ smras nas/ de nas srin pos chag su/ bcad pa phyed smras so// skyes aM 'gog par gyur pa ba na/ de dag nye ba bzhi la ba de/ de'i wan po des tshig hUM/ 
199a2(1): bcad pa de smras nas/ yang 'di skad ces zer ro// byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po khyod tshags u bcad pa phyed po'i don rdzogs par thos nas// da khyod kyi smon khaM yongs su rdzogs mod kyi/ ci ste khyod des par sem cam kha
199a3(1): phan pa dang / bde ba'i don 'gyod pa la yang dag pa yin zhe na/ da pa la lus sbyin pa li dus la 'bab bo zhes/ smra ba so// rigs kyi khya de'i tshe/ de'i du sa na/ don 'di shi na tu yid la byas nas/ de'i 'og tu brag dang ba tshig/ ro ma/ dang zhing
199a4(1): dang / laM kun tu tshig su bcad pa 'di 'bris nas// lus kyi sha myi snga pa bar bya bzhi phyir/ lus lu kon pa'i gos bsdams shing ka pa 'dzegs so// de'i tshe shing de'i lhas pa la 'di skad dris so// leg so skyes bu chen
199a5(1): po khyod b+ha mi zhig byed snyam du seMs so// rigs kyi bu ngas de'i/ tshe na de la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo ni lus 'di yongasubatab nye/ tshigs su bcad pa thos pa'i dran bas pa snyam sos la
199a6(1): shing de'i lha des smras pa/ tshigs su bcad pa de thos na// phan pa na don mi yod ces smras so// byang chub ses dpa' des smras pa/ tshigs su gcad pa 'dis ni 'das kha dang / ma 'ongs pa dpa lta
199a7(1): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs nyid 'byed pa'i chos yin te/ pani chos/ 'di'i phyir lus yongs su gtong ngo // rnyed po dang grags pa dang longs 'apyod dang / rin po che dang / 'khor lo sbyar ba 'i
199a8(1): rgyal po dang / rgyal zim rigs bzhi'i rgyal po dang / brgya byin 'arna 'i dbang phyug dang / tshangs pa chen po 'i rgyal po dang // lha/ rab phyi'i bde ba 'dod pa'i byi ma yi na gi/ chos can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don kyi phyir lus
199a9(1): 'di yongs u gtong ngo // rigs kyi bu ra'i lus 'di yongs su btang pa'i che// ya pa 'di skad ces smras po/ tsi tsam tu yeras+dza la gnas pa 'i ses can dag/ bdag gis yongs su btang ba 'di mtho na/ sbyin pa la gnas
199a10(1): par 'gyur ba dang / gang sbyin pa la zhes la pa rgyal gyis mngon par zin pa dag kyang / bdag gis/ l+yAs yongs su btang pa 'di mthor par shog shig ces/ smon laM btab nas// lus 'di mchig a laMs rdo ltar yongasu/ 
199b1(1): byang chub es dpal de'i tshe na 'di skad ces smras ma thag tu shing ka nas mchongs so// de'i tshe de'i tus na ste dgi bar sna las// sgra skad rnam pa sna tshogs byu na sa// srid pa'i ma mo la thug gi khar du grags par
199b2(1): rgyagyurapa te/ de'i tshe de'i dus ma srin po de brgya byin gyi lus su sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpalas la a U bar blangs te/ bde bar bzhag go// de'i tshe rgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dang / lha 'i sras lo dang / tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal/ 
199b3(1): @bor bcas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la ba lci 'os phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa ste/ so sa tsamatshang byed pa la 'anas dang bde ba'i don tu 'byung
199b4(1): pa rig pa'i mun pa chen por/ chos chen po'i sgron ma ldang bar byed pa/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos chen mo srung zhing skyab pa 'i phyir/ khyod kyi sems khrugs shing gnod pa byas pa// bdag 'gyod cing snol lo// 
199b5(1): khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus nges par bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba na/ bdag cag kyang sgral par spro nad to// de'i tshe brgya byin lha yi dbang phyug dang / lha'i sras
199b6(1): po rnams/ byang chub ses dpa' la phyag/ 'tshal nas// myi snang par gyur to// rigs kyi bu pa sngon tshigs su bcad pa khyed/ kyi phyir yang lus yongs su btang ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis zhang
199b7(1): pa bcu gnyis kyis byams pakhas sngar/ bla na byed pa yang dan par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu ngas de ltar tshad myed pa'i yon tan thob pa yang
199b8(1): de bzhin gshegs pa 'i yang dag pa'i chos pa mchod pa 'i dbang gis so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang de dang 'dra ste/ bla na byed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa ba// byang chub sems dpa' chang bye
199b9(1): pa mthal yas klung gapa'aga'i bye ba rnyed pas shi nad tu 'phags te phul tu gyurd to// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpal theg pa chen po yongs su mya ngam la la 'das la la gnas ma/ 'phags pa'i myang
199b10(1): spyod pa zhes bya'o// / 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las/ 'phags pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u sde drug pa'o// 
200a1(1): gtigs kyi phu gan kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs par spyod pazhen// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po then pa na ma yongs su byar nas na yogs ma
200a2(1): A rnam pa 'di bdun gyis ni// tshangs par khyod pa dang ldan par gyur to// bdun gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos shes pa dang / don shes pa dang / 'du shes pa dang / chog shes pa dang // bdag shes pa dang / 'khor shes pa dang / bla ma dang 'og ma
200a3(1): shes pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ci skar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos shes pa zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdo sde bcu gnyis shes pa yin te/ mdo sde dang dbyangs kyis snyan pa dang / 
200a4(1): yung du bsta dad pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi' dang / rtogs par brjod pa dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shi na tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du 'byung ba'i chos
200a5(1): dang / gtan la dbab par bas nad par shes pa'o// rigs kyi bu mod zhes bya ba ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes smos pa nas/ dga' na rjes su yid rang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ni mdo sde zhes bya'o// 
200a6(1): dbyangs snyand pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slonanags bka' mams dpa/ bdag cag rgyang shin tu glend te shes pa myed pas pags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag pa ci lha bzhin duny+tsar+ya
200a7(1): myi shes te/ de bas na khror bar yongs su 'khor zhing/ sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho'i chen por nub par gyurd to// bden pa bzhi yang gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal kun tu phyung ba dang / 'gog pa dang lam mo// sngon bcom ldan
200a8(1): 'das kyis dge' slong rnams la mdo sde gsungs nas/ de'i tshe na skye bo dbang po rnon po dag de'i 'og tu chos nyand pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lhags so// gzhan dag sa 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar 'di ci zhig mdzad
200a9(1): ces dris pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyend bzhin tu mdo sde sngar gsungs pa las/ yang tshigs su bcad pa de 'di skad du gsungs pa yin no// da sngon khyed dang 'dra bar ni/ bden pa bzhi po ma mthong ste// de bas khor bar yongs
200a10(1): 'khor// sdug bsngal chen po rgya mtshor ltung // gang gis bden pa bzhi rtogs na// 'khor ba yongs su spyod par 'gyur// skye ba'i srid pa kun zad na/ srid pa thams cad len myi srid ces bya ba dag ni dbyangs kyis snyand pa'i sde zhes bya/ 
200b1(1): lung du ba nyand pa'i sde zhes bya n+ti// mdo sde 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pas// dus kha gcig tu lha dang byi rnams sa sangs rgyas su lung ba stonod pa me// ma pas pa khyod la 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal po drung zhes bya ba zung ba// rna gyi na
200b2(1): dus na mngon par rtswar rgya te/ mtshan yang byams pa bya bar gyur ro zhes smos pa dag ni lung bstand pa'i sde zhes bya'o// tshigs su bcad pa'i sde zhes bya ba ni// mdo sde dang // 'dul pa gang las lhag par tshigs su ma cad pa/ tshig pa ni
200b3(1): pa 'di dag spros pa ste// sdig pa thams cad yongs su spang / dge'o mchog ni rdzogs par bya/ bdag gi sems kyang shi nad tu gtsul/ de'i sangs rgyas pas nad pa'o zhes smos pa de dag ni tshigs su bcad pa'i sde zhes bya'o// 
200b4(1): ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba ni// bcom ldan 'das byi dro'i su ting nge 'dzin tu zhugs nas/ lha rnams la rgya cher chos ma nad te/ de'i tshe dge slong dag so so nas 'di snyam du// de bzhin gshegs pa da ska ma ji zhig gi mdzad snyam pas
200b5(1): nas/ de'i nang par de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs ted sus kyang ma zhus par gzhan gyi bsam pa mkhyend pa'o ye shes kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye dge slong dag 'di ltar shes par bya'o// 
200b6(1): zhus par ched du pa bsrungs pa de dag mched du brjod pa'i sde zhes bya'o// gleng bzhi zhes bya ba ni mdo sde las Ni gas bshad 'byung ba/ gleng gzhi nas 'byed cing bsteni de ste/ de yang yul mnyam du yod pa na
200b7(1): skye bu gcig gis bya rgyas bya bzung nas/ ser por bcug ste// chu dang 'bras bsnyad nas phyir btang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sngon gyi rgyu dang rkyen mkhyend pas de las glengs te// tshigs su bcad nyid gsungs so// 
200b8(1): sdig pa phra mo n+yat+pa la~M/ byi gnod snyam du brnyas myi bya/ chu'i thigs pa 'dzag pa yang // snod chen yongs su gang bar 'gyur/ zhes gsungs pa dag ni gleng gzhi'i sde zhes bya'o// rtogs par brjod pa ni zhes bya ba ni
200b9(1): 'dul ba las dwapa' bstand pa rnams te/ de dag ni rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar byung zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa las// dge slong dag 'di ltar rigs par bya'o// nga 'jig rten gshegs
201a1(1): te gsungs pa rnams mi khams kyi mdo sde zhes bya ba dang / bcom ldan 'das 'asod skyabs 'jig rten tu gshegs te gsungs pa ni btsun gyi rna zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 'jig rten du gshegs te gsungs pa'i
201a2(1): chos kyi phyi song bya ba dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gshegs te gsungs pa/ stong pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba smos pa de dag ni de ltar byung ba'i sde zhes bya'o// skyes pa'i rabs shes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems pa
201a3(1): dpyad pa spyod cing dka' ba mdzad pa 'di dag yin te/ dge slong rnams shes par gyis shig/ ras sngon sha ba'i lus byas pa dang / dred mo'i lus dang / sha bkra'i lus dang / ri bong gi lus dang // rgyal po'i sus dang / du 'or lo
201a4(1): sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i lus dang / thu dang nam mkha'i lding gi lus las sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na myong bar gyur da to zhes smos pa ni skyes pa'i rabs shes bya'o// shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni
201a5(1): theg pa chen po shand tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde don shi nad tu rgya che la yangs pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra zhes gsungs pa na shi na tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde zhes bya'o// rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba ni bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i
201a6(1): bog ma bcas ma thag tu sus kyang ma bstan par gom pa bdun sod pa dang // 'od zer chen po bkye ba dang // phyogs bcu ltas pa dang spre'u spraN+DI snod thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba dang / khyi gor/ hu cu rtsa
201a7(1): kar sangs rgyas la chos nyand pa dang / bdud sdig to can pan glang sngon por srul nas gyo mo lhung bzed mang po'i bzhag pa'i nang du song ste/ gcig la gcig reg cing khrol yang ma chag pa dang / sangs rgyas thog ma bcas nas
201a8(1): lha'i 'jig rten tu zhugs nas lha rnams langs te phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa de dag ni mang du byung ba'i sde zhes bya'o// gtan la 'babs par bas nad pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gsungs pa las
201a9(1): ci tsam don bstand pa la bab par bye brag phye ste/ mtshan nyid bahand pa ni gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i sde zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar mdo sde bcu'i gnyis rtogs shing shes na/ chos shes bya'o// de la ci ltar
201a10(1): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don shes pa zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ye she dang tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyi don brgyas par shes pa ni don shes pa zhes bya'o// de la ci ltar na byang chub
201b1(1): sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po chus shes pa zhen// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nus gang tu ngur khrod na gnas pa nas / gang gi dus su brtson 'grus shinang tu tshom pa rang / gang gi dus yul tang d+hog+sa/ 
201b2(1): rang ting nge 'dzind bsgom pa dang / gang gi dus su sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / gang gi chus su slob dpon la bsnyen bkur bya dang / gang gi dus su sbyin pa dang / gang gi dus su tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / bcom
201b3(1): 'bras dang she pas mi gtan dang / shes rab la nan tan bya ba'i 'du shes pa ni 'du shes pa zhes bya'o// des kyi sbyar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chog shes pa zhen no/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang
201b4(1): sems dpa' chen po chog shes pa ni 'di ska ste/ zas dang / skom dang chos gos dang / sman dang 3/ 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyas pa dang / gnyid las sang dang / cas kyi smra ba dag mi mchog shes pa zhes bya'o//

201b9(1): dad pa dang ma dad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' dad pa ni dge ba dang / ma dad pa ni myi dge bar rig par bya'o// dad pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ dge 'dun gyi gnas su gnas pa dang myi gnas pa'o// de yang byang chub sems dpa'am gas
202a1(1): dge' 'dun gyi gnas khang na gnas pa ni dge ba'o// myi gnas pa ni myi dge' ba'o// gnas pa sa yang rnam pa gnyis te/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag myi 'chal pa dang // de yang byang chub sems dpa'
202a2(1): gang phyag 'tshal ba ni dge ba/ phyag myi 'tshal ba ni myi dge bar rig par bya'o// phyag 'tshal ba la yang rnam gnyis te/ chos nyand pa dang chos myi nyand pa'o// de yang byang chub sems dpa' gang chos nyand pa ni dge ba dang
202a3(1): chos myi nyand pa ni myi dge bar rig par bya'o// chos nyan pa la yang rnam pa gnyis so// sems che gcig tu nyand pa dang / sems che gcig tu myi nyand pa'o// de yang byang chub sems dpa' sa cheg gcig tu nyand pa ni dge ba/ tshig
202a4(1): gcig tu myi nyand pa ni myi dge bar rig par bya'o// sems che gcig tu nyan pa yang rnam pa gnyis te/ don yid la byed pa dang / don yid la myi byed pa'o// de yang byang chub sems dpa' sa gang don yid la byed pa ni dge' ba'o// /

202a7(1): cad la phan pa dang bde' ba'i don tu myi dpyod pa dang / bla na myed pa'i byang chub tu bsngos te/ 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ gang 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed pa'i mchog dam pa'o// 
202a8(1): rigs kyi bu dper na rin po che'i nang na ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni mchog go// ro bro ba'i nang na bdud rtsi mchog go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang lha dang myi'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur/ phul du gyur pa to// dper byar myed do// 
202a9(1): rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni snyems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i modo la gnas pa na/ dge ba'i chos brnyan la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa 'di bdun dang ldan na tsa
202a10(1): par 'apyod par zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshangs par pyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms so// byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
202b1(1): gsoyod to// rnabacos ldan 'das byangs pa mang du bsgos pas zhe sdang mchis par 'gyur te/ snying rje'i sems kyis kyang zhe sdang gcod par gyurd pas na ci'i slad du chad myed pa man da ba sgom / don dang spya na gsum chubs so// 
202b2(1): bcom ldan 'das byams pa la dmyigs pa rnam pa gsu ste/ sems can la dmyigs pa dang / chos la dmyigs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa'o// snying rje dang dga' ba dang / gtang snyoms kyang de dang 'dra ste// don dang spya na gsu du bas te
202b3(1): bzhir ni ma mchis te/ sems can la dmyigs pa ni phung po lnga la dmyigs nas/ bde bar 'dod pa ste/ de ni sems lnga dmyigs pa zhes bya'o// chos la dmyigs pa ni sems can la dmyigs nas ci dgos pa sbyin pa ste/ de ni chos la byi
202b4(1): pa zhes bya'o// myi dmyigs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dmyigs pa ste/ myi dmyigs pa zhes mgyi'o// byams pa zhes bgyi ba ni dbul phongs pa'i sems can la dmyigs pa'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po na// dbul longs
202b5(1): pa dang yongs su bral te/ rab tu bde ba lags so// ci ste sems can la dmyigs na sangs rgyas la dmyigs pa ma lags te/ chos kyang de dang da 'dra'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la dmyigs pa ni myi dmyigs/ 
202b6(1): ba zhes bgyi'o// chomam ldan 'das byams pas dmyigs pa ni sems hA/ te dper na pha ma 'am/ chung ma 'am bu 'am gnyen gshes la dmyigasapA 'dra so// de bas na sems can la dmyigs pa zhes pabya'o// chos la
202b7(1): dmyigs pa ni pha ma dang chung ma dang / bu dang gnyen gshes su myi lta zhing / chos thams cad rten cing 'brel te 'byung bar lta ba ni/ chos la dmyigs pa zhes bgyi'o// myi dmyigs pa ni chos mtshan mar myi gnas/ sems
202b8(1): la mtshan mar myi dmyigs pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa zhes bgyi' ste// snying rje dang dag lnga dang btang ba snyoms kyang de dang 'dra'o// de bas na gsum zhubs kyis bzhir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang zag la rnam
202b9(1): pa gnyis ste/ mthong pas spyod pa dga' bas 'apyod pa'o// mthong bas spyod pa ni byams pa dang snying rje'i shas cher bsgom pa'o// dga' bas 'aspyod pa ni dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi shas
202b10(1): cher bsgom ste/ de bas na gsum du bas kyis/ bzhir ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ mtha' yas pa la mtha' dpag tu mchis pa'i slad du chad ma mchis
203a1(1): ba zhes bgyi ste/ tshad ma mchis na gcig tubs kyis bzhir ma mchis so// ji ste bzhin ma mchis na/ tshad ma mchis pa zhes bgyir myi rung ste// de bas na gcig
203a2(1): dulas kyi bzhir ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od bsrung la bka' sacal da pa// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni so so skye bo'i phyir/ chos gsungs pa yang shind du
203a3(1): dgongs ste gsungs pa yin pas/ rig cing shes pas dka'o// sems can zha gcig la rte nad cing 'breld te brung ba gcig pu gsung so// rte nad cing 'brel par byung ba gcig gang
203a4(1): zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dus kyi chos thams cad do// rigs kyi bu wa gcig ni rnam pa gnyis gsungs te rgyu dang 'bras bu'o// zha gcig ni rnam pa gsum du
203a5(1): gsungs te/ nyon mongos po dang las dang sdug bsngal lo// / khwa gcig tu ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs te/ ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'o// kha gcig tu ni rnam pa

203a7(1): rnam pa gdun cu gsungs te/ rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / drug gyi skye mched dang / reg bya dang !/ tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / le nad pa dang / kha gcig ni rnam pa brgyad du gsungs
203a8(1): ma rig pa dang // 'du byed dang skye ba dang / rga shi ma gtogs pa lhag ma brgyad do// kha gcig tunin rnam pa dgur gsungs te/ mdo sde grong khyer zhes bya ba'i nang nas/ bshad pa dang 'dra ba
203a9(1): mo rig pa dang rnam par shes pa ma gtogs pa'i lhag ma dgu po'o// kha gcig tu ni rnam pa bcu gcig tu gsungs te/ de yang gcer bu pa kun tu smra ba zhes bya ba'i phyir/ skye ba'i chos gcig ma gtogs par lhag
203a10(1): ma bcu gcig go// skabs su gcig tu rten cing 'brel da te 'byung po bcu gnyis rdzogs par gsungs te/ de yang rgyal po'i khab tu 'od srung la sogs pa la ma rig pa nas skye ba dang / rga shi'i bar du bcu gnyis
203b1(1): rdzogs par gsungs kha'o// rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba gcig la so so'i skye bo'i phyir rnam pa tha dad du gsungs te/ tshad myed pa'i sems kyang de dang 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu de bas de bzhin gshegs
203b2(1): pas dgongs te gsungs pa'i 'aspyod yul the tsom myi skyed do// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni shi nad tu thabs zhes pa dang ldan pas/ myi rtag pa la rtag par gsungs pa/ bde ba la sdug bsngal
203b3(1): par gsungs bsdug bsngal lnga bde bar gsungs yongs su ma dag pa yang yongs su dag par gsungs yongs su dag pa la ni yongs su ma dag par gsungs/ bdag la bdag myed par gsungs
203b4(1): bdag myed pa ya bdag tu gsungs/ sems can la sems can ma yin par gsungs/ dngos po ma yin pa las dngos por gsungs// dngos po la ni dngos po ma yin par gsungs/ myi bden pa la ni bden par gsungs
203b5(1): bden pa la ni myi bden par gsungs/ yul ma yin pa la ni yul du gsungs/ yul la ni yul ma yin par gsungs// skye ba ma yin pa la ni skye bar gsungs/ skye ba la ni skye ba ma yin par
203b6(1): gsungs pa nas ma rig pa la rig par gsungs/ rig pa la nimarig par gsungs// gzugs la ni gzugs ma yin par gsungs gzugs ma yin pa la ni gzugs su gsungs lam ma yin pa yin
203b7(1): 'am du gsungs lam la ni lam ma yin par gsungs so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni tshad byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa sems can 'dul ba'i phyir/ brdzun pa'i 'ag la zhig gsungs
203b8(1): rigs kyi bu sems can la la zhig longs 'apyod la chags nangs de la khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por srul nas lo tshad myed pa'i bar du ji dang rdzi 'dod pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs byind te/ de'i 'og tu gdod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
203b9(1): byang chub la dkod do// sems can la la ji ste 'dod pa lnga la chags na/ lo chad myed pa'i bar du 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i mchog dam pa la longs spyod du bcug nas/ de'i 'og tu gdod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
203b10(1): 'i byang chub la dkod do// gal te sems can la la rigapa bsnyems shing nga rgyal can du 'gyur mangs myi de'i g.yog lo tshad myed pa'i bar du byas ste shi nang tu bsnyend bkur gyis / de'i sems mgu bar byas nas
204a1(1): de'i 'og su gdod bla na byed pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod do// sems can gang zhig rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal tu 'gyur te/ gzhan gyis gros btab cing bcos/ dgos ma'o brgya rtsod/ 
204a2(1): gi bar du bas nad cing bcos nas/ bems nub par byas te/ gdod bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni lo tshard byed pa'i bar byu bas rngub pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro/ 
204a3(1): ba mang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa'i phyir brdzun pa yin nam/ sems rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni myi dge' ba la gnas kyang pad mo ltar nyes pa'i 'dam rdzab phyis myi gos so// rigs kyi bu
204a4(1): tshad myed pa bzhi'i don yang ltar shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu tshad myed pa'i sems ni rang bzhin gyis rnam pa bzhi ste/ gang zhig gis nan tan byas na/ tshangs pa chen po'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// 
204a5(1): rigs kyi bu de ltar na tshad myed pa rnams la grogs su 'gyur na rnam pa/ bzhi yod so// de bas na bzhi zhes bya'o// gang byams pa'i sems la nan tan byed pa ni/ 'dod chags yongs su rgod par
204a6(1): 'gyur ro// stong rje'i sems sa nan tan byed pa ni zhe snang yongs suspong bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba'i sems lanan tan byed pa ni myi bde ba yongs su spor par 'gyur ro// btid pa snyoms kyi skyenas/ bca
204a7(1): la nan tan byed pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi sems yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu don de lta bas na rnam pa bzhi ste gcig gam gnyis sam gsum ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar byams pa'i sos
204a8(1): kyis zhe sdang spong ba ltar/ snying rje'i sems kyis de dang 'dra bas gsum du 'os so zhes de skad ma zer gcig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu zhe sdang la rnam gnyis te/ srog dang bral ba'i snang dang / rdeg chog byed bri
204a9(1): zhe sdang ngo // byams pa bsgoms pas ni srog dang bral ba'i zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur ro// snying rje bsgoms pas ni rdeg chog byed pa'i zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu don de lta bas na tshad myed pa ni bzhir 'os
204a10(1): pa yin nam/ gzhan yang zhe sdang rnam pa gnyis so/ sems can pa zhe sdang ba dang / sems can ma yin pa la zhe sdang ba'o// byams pa bsgoms pas ni sems can la zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur ro// snying rje bsgoms
204b1(1): pas ni sems can ma yin pa la zhe sdang spo par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang zhe sdang la rnam pa gnyis ste/ rgyu dang rkyen dang ldan pa dang / rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa'o// byams pa bsgoms pas ni rgyu rkyen dang ldan pa spong bar 'gyur ro// 
204b2(1): snyi rje bsgoms pas ni rgyu rkyen dang phyi ldan pa spong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang zhe sdang la rnam pa gnyis te// sngon 'das nas gom sa dang / da skar gyi dus na goms pa'o// byams pa bsgoms pas ni sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi goms pa spong
204b3(1): bar 'gyur ro// ting rje bsgoms pas ni dgrar kyi dus kyi goms pa so par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang zhe sdang la rnam pa gnyis te/ gaphags pa la zhe sdang ba dang byis pa ma rabs la zhe sdang ba'o// byam sa ba'i sems pa sgoms pa sa nI
204b4(1): 'phags pa la de sdang ba spong bar 'gyur ro// snying rje'i sems bsgoms pas ni byis pa ma rabs la zhe sdang ba spong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ni sngang la rnam pa gnyis ste/ de snang rab nga 'bring ngo do// byams pa bsgoms pa pa'i
204b5(1): zhe sdang rab spong bar 'gyur ro// snying rje bsgoms pas ni zhe sdang 'bring spong da par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu don de lta bas na rnam pa bzhir 'os na/ gsum du zad kyis bzhir myed do// zhe rgal pa myi rigs so// de bas na
204b6(1): 'od srung chad byed pa'i sems la grogs dang gnyen por 'grurab pa ni rnam pa bzhir phye ste bstand pa yin no// gzhan yang snod kyi phyir na rnam pa/ bzhir 'os so// gal te snong gang la byams pa dang ldan na// de la dga'
204b7(1): ba rtso pa yod pa pa'i ste sa ma pa ni yeng byed/  kyi kyong 'a bye bas su pa rnam pa na ba 'o//  byas baspyod rgyun sti dgas pa
204b8(1): bloms byed pa de bas na rnam pa bzhin mnon no// rigs kyi bu chad byed pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi 'os so// gzhan yang chad byed pa ni rnam pa ra ni mdang / sa char byed pa'i sems pamabyin na gyinas pa so da' gru pa
204b9(1): pa dang // byamam pa'i sems la gcig ni dang du 'byung ba dmyigs pa ma yin pa dang / byams pa'i sems gcig ni khyigs pa yang yong sa dang dra sang 'gyur ba dang / byangs pa'i sems pa gcig ni phyogs sa dus
204b10(1): 'gyur ba yang ma yin no// de la chad byed pa'i sems gang ni dmyigs pa yod la dbang du 'gyur ba ma yin zhe na/ kha gcig sems ched myed pa mtha' yas su dmyigs kyang / ting nge 'dzin kyad bangam thob pas ci se thob kyang ba des sas/ 
205a1(1): / thob kyang byed rnams papo char byed pa gang zhig dbang bya 'gyur yang dmyigs pa ma yin zhen/ 'di la ste dper na pha ma dang pu nu dang gnyen gshes la bde bar bya bar dbyigs pa nye// cad byed par rgyas
205a2(1): kA ni ma yin no// tshad myed pa gang zhig dmyigs kyang dmyigs la dbang cu yang 'gyur ba zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so// tshad byed pa gang zhig dmyigs pa sang ma yin dang su gyur pa yang ma yin zhen/ 
205a3(1): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas lta bu ni/ sems can tshad byed pa la mye chen dmyigs kyang myi nus la/ dbang su 'gyur la dam yang ma yin no// rigs kyi bu don de lta bas ma// tshad myed pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
205a4(1): rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi pyod yul lo// rigs kyi bu de ltar dngos po rnam pa bzhi po 'di ni nyan thos dpa dang sangs rgyas la yang cad byed pa zhes bya thod kyi spos su mi cho
205a5(1): go// sangs rgyab bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad byed mtha' yas pa zhes/ bya'o// byangs chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang sangs rgyas da gsol pa bcos ldan 'das de de bzhin no de de bzhi te/ bcom ldan
205a6(1): b+h+ya/ 'das kyis gsungs pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyipyod yul lags kyi/ can pos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis bzod pa lags so/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang theg pa
205a7(1): chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas nas/ byams pa dang snying rje'i sems su 'gyur ba las/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i sems ma lags so zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ba ma mchis samabacom ldan 'das kyis bka'
205a8(1): samald pa yod// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gal te sems can rnams la gnyen par bar ma gsum du phye ste/ gnyen la yang rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnam pa gsum du phye la dgra sdang ba la yang de bzhin du
205a9(1): rnam par phye nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyen du 'gyur ba'i mchog la ni bde ba'i mchog sprin gnyen 'bring dang tha ma la ni snyoms par bde ba'i mchog tsam sbyin/ dgra sdang ba'i mchog la ni bde ba
205a10(1): shas cung zad sbyin dgra sdang ba/ 'bring la ni bde ba yang 'bring nga tsam byin/ dgra sdang ba tha ma la ni bde ba'i mchog byin te// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du gong nas gong du dgra sdang ba mchog la ni bde ba 'bring tsam byin
205b1(1): nagra snang ba 'bring dang tha mas ni mnyam pa bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa la nam tan byed dam/ gong nas gong mu rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la yang bde ba'i mchog mnyam par sbyin la nan tan byed dam gal te dgra sdang ba'i mchog
205b2(1): la bde ba'i mchog basbyin par nan tan byed na/ de ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// / byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe pha ma dang dgra sdang ba mchog la yang bye brag byed cing / sems mnyam par gyu rad kyang / rigs kyi bu del
205b3(1): byams pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po ni ma yin no// gsolnga pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad tu/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i byams pa dang ldan yang byams pa chen po zhes bgyi/ bka' la cal dpa// rigs kyi
205b4(1): bu shind ldan par dka' na byams pa chen po zhes myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na yun ring po nas bskald pa tshad myed pa'i bar du nyon mongs pa mang du bsagasal/ dge ba'i chos ma bsgoms pas// de bas na nyim zhag gam zhag
205b5(1): Ni tsam gyis sems 'dul bar myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpe dar na sran ma skom po sa ni khab kyis bcugs kyang myi tshugs pa dang 'dra bar nyon mongs shi nad tu sras snabang de dang 'dra ste// nyin mtshan// na gcig tsam
205b6(1): zhig sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur te/ ma yengs kyang shind tu 'phruladaga'o// gzhan yang 'di lta se/ khyi myis myi 'jigs te/ ri dgas sha ba la sagos pa kyis 'jigs te mthong ma thag tu bros so// 
205b7(1): zhe sdang shi nad tu spang dka' ba yang khyim bsrung ba'i khyi dang 'dra'o// byams pa'i sems shi nad tu nyams sla ba'i ni ri dgas sha ba dang 'dra'o/ de bas na sems shi nad tu 'dul dka' bas byams pa chen po zhes kyi bya'o// 
205b8(1): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na rdo lI mo pras na rtag tu yod do// chu la ri mo bris na de ma thag tu myed par gyurd te myi gnas so// zhe sdar ni rdo pa la ri mo bris pa dang 'dra'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba ni chu la ri mo bris pa dang 'dra ste
205b9(1): de bas na sems 'di ni shin tu 'dul dka' ba'o// gzhan yang dper na mye'i phung po chen po'i 'od ni yun ring du yod do// glog kyi 'od ni skad cig ma se/ myi gnas/ zhe sdang ni mye'i phung po dang 'dra'o// byams pa ni glog
205b10(1): 'od dang 'dra ste// de bas na sems ni shi nad tu 'dul dka' ba ste/ don de lta bas na byams pa chen po zhes myi bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o// 
206a1(1): de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu sdig to can gyi mchog ni log sred can zhes bya'o// sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po bsgom pa ni log sred can la yang bye brag sems byedas
206a2(1): kA nyes pa phyi mthong bas zhe sdang phyi rnyed de/ don de lta bas na byams pa chen po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi phan dang bye par gyi 'gyur ba yongs su selang pa ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o// gsems can mang po la
206a3(1): phan pa dang bde ba chad byed pa byin pa ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// / sems can thams cad dga' ba'i chen po zhes bya'o// skyob pa myed pa ni btang ba snyoms chen po zhes bya'o// bdag dang chos dang mtshan nyid dang / bdag gis
206a4(1): lus su myi mthong zhing chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba ni btang bsnyoms chen po'o// bdag gi bde pa btang nas gzhan la byin 8 ba ni btang snyoms chen po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chad byed pa bzhi tsam gyis
206a5(1): byams pa dag pha rol tu phyind pa drug skye zhing rdzogs par 'gyur gyis 'byod/ pa gzhan gyis ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na sngar 'jig rten gyi cha byed pa bzhi'i sems thob nas gdod na
206a6(1): byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tuse pa bskyed par gyur te/ 'ichas kyis 'jig rten las sadas pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'ag te gyi chang byed pa'i stsal sa/ 'jig rten 'a bdas pa'i chad byed pa 'ong btu tu
206a7(1): bar gyur te/ de bas na chad byed pa chen po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phan pa dang bde bar myi 'gyur ba yongs su si lad cing phan pa dang bde ba bsams pa ni / bsams cam
206a8(1): du bas kyis yang dag par phan pa dang bde bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dper na dge slong myi gtsang ba la rtog pa ni lus la gyon pa'i gos kyang 'phags par mthong med kyis yang dag par bkas ma lags so// zas rnams kyang
206a9(1): srin bu'i 'du shes mod kyi/ yang dag par srin bu ma lags so// sran tshod thung ba yang myi gtsang ba'i zhu' bar 'du shes mod kyi yang dag par myi gtsang ba'i zhu' pa ni ma lags so// zhol rkang ngam glad par 'du shes mod kyi
206a10(1): yang dag par glad pa ma lags so// sa phye la phyer 'du shes mod kyi yang dag par ni phye ma lags so// tshad myed pa'i sems kyang de dang 'dra ste/ yang dag par sems can la phan pa dang bde bar ba ni ma lags kyi/ khe tsam zhig
206b1(1): mas can pa de btsun nas smra nga/ yang dag ma de par gyi 'thur ni da sa bur sems pa brdzun pa ma lagasas pa bcom ldan 'das ji nye brdzun pa 'gas la yang dag par bded par 'gyur ba zhig da ci bu
206b2(1): sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin kyi brlabs kyis/ thams cad bde ba myong bar myi mdzad/ ci ste yang dag par bde bar myi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
206b3(1): tu dran pa/ sngon byams pa'i sems 'ab shig ya nan tan byas pa tsam gyis/ bskal da pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lan bdum bkrus kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ma skyes te/ 'jig rten chags pa'i dus na ni tshangs pa'i lhar
206b4(1): bskyes / 'jig rten zhig pa'i rgyas na ni 'og myin gnam gyi lhar skyes so/ tshangs pa'i lhar bskyes pa na/ dab pa dang mthur ldan te// gzhan gyi zla lad kyis myi non te/ tshangs pa tong gi nang na/ mchog su gyu rang phul du gyur te/ 
206b5(1): tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal por bskyes nas// sems can thams cadadakyis bdag la khro bor 'dra shes skyes so/ lam bA su pa gsum gyi bar tsu/ suM bcu rtsa gsum gnas gyi sgra'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug du bskyeso// 
206b6(1): phye ba tshad byed pa pa rgya gong gi bar byam mam lo srung ba'i rgyamathor skyes so/ zhes gzungs te/ byas sa pa'i sems 'a ba zhig bsgoms pa ska nga bya'i bun gsung tshogs pa zab pas na 'jig kyi badren ni ska du gnam pa bas
206b7(1): pa dang yang cis ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' satshal de pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi khu khyod ni sha nad tu dpa' pas skyi'ajigs pa dang ldan no// de nas 'od srung la tshigasu bcad de bka' sam la
206b8(1): pa/ gang zhig sems can gcig tsam la/ zhe sdang sems ni myi skyed cing / de la bde bar 'dod pa ni/ shi nad tu byams pa zhes bya'o// gang zhig sems can thams cad la// snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa/ de ni 'phags pa'i rigs
206b9(1): zhes bya/ bsod nams chad byed thob par 'gyur/ ci ge mngon shes lnga ldan pa'i drang srong sa chen gang par 'gyur/ dbang dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhig/ med pa thams cad sbyin dang / rta dang pa lang nor sna tshogs// de'i sa
206b10(1): bon bsod nams thob pa ni/ byams pa bsgoms pa'i bsod nams kyi/ bcu drug cha gcig tsam myi bor/ rigs kyi bu byams pa bsgoms pa ni rdzun ma yin te/ yang dag pa bden pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
207a1(1): byams pa ni brdzun pa zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i byams ni yang dag pa ste/ myi brtun par ji mngon zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar yongs su byang nas/ 
207a2(1): 'das pa chen po la gnas pa ni/ sa ya yang gser du mthong / gser la yang sar mthong se// sa la ni chur mthong // tshu la yang sA mthong / chu la ni mer mthong / mye la yang chung mthong / sa la ni rlung ngu mthong/ rlung la yang sar mtho ste/ 
207a3(1): yid bzhin tu grub pas brdzun pa myed do// sems can yang dag pa la ni sems can ma yin par yang mthong / sems can ma yin pa la ni yang dag par sems can du mthong ste/ yid bzhin du grub pas brdzun pa myed do// rigs kyi bu de bas na bya/ 
207a4(1): chub sems dpa'i tshad myed pa bzhi'i sems kyi bsam pa ni yang dag pa'o// / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na yang dag pa bsam pa zhe na// nyon mongs bu yongs su sel dpa' phyir ro// rigs kyi bu byams pa la sgoms pas ni
207a5(1): 'dod chags yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// snying rje'i sems bsgoms pas ni zhe sdang yongs su spong bar 'gyur/ dga' ba'i sems bsgomasapas ni myi bde ba yongs su spong bar 'gyur/ btang snyoms kyi sems bzlom
207a6(1): pA ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang sems can du 'du shes pa yongs su spong bar 'gyurate de bas na yang dag pa'i bsam zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa bzhi'i sems ni dge ba/ 
207a7(1): 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bzhir 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji nye sems can dbul phongs pa dag myi mthong na/ byams pa skye ba'i rgyu myed de/ gal te byams pa ma skyes pa sbyin pa byin pa'i sems
207a8(1): myi 'byung ngo // sbyin pa byin pa'i rkyend kyis sems can bde bar 'gyur ba ni/ 'dra lta he zas dang skom dang theg pa dang gos dang / gdugs dang mye tog dang bting ba'i khri bstan dang / khang khyim dang snang ba'i mye mar la sogs pa sbyin
207a9(1): pa ste de ltar sbyin pa byin pa ni// de sems ma bcings pa ste/ chags pa myi skye ba dang // gdon myi za bar bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa'o// de'i tshe na sems ni slang myi chags shing 'du shes pa gcod pa dang / 
207a10(1): rnyed pa dang grags pas myi 'jigs pa dang / lha dang myi'i bde ba myi tshol ba dang / nga rgyal myi skye ba dang / lan myi re pa dang / pha rol po la bslu ba'i phyir smin pa byin pa ma yin pa dang / longs daspyod 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / 
207b1(1): sbyin pa byin pa na lend par myi lta/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / bsod nams kyi zhing dang / bsod nams kyi zhing ma yin pa dang / gshes gnyen dang / gshes gnyen ma yin par myi lha/ sbyin pa
207b2(1): byin na snod dang snod ma yin par myi g+ha/ nyi ma dang dus dang gnas dang / gnas ma yin par myi lta/ mu ge dang shi nad tu skyid pa'i dus kyang myi lha// rgyu dang 'bras bur yang myi lta ste/ sems can dang sems can ma yin pa dang / bsod nams dang bsod
207b3(1): nam pa ma yin par bya lta / de skad sbyin dang le nad pa dang / nor gyi dngos por myi lta bas na pa du gcod pa dang / 'bras bu sbyin pa'i bar du gyi lha myi mod kyi/ sbyin pa rtag tu 'apyod de/ rgyun gyi chad do// rigs kyi bu byang chub
207b4(1): sems dpa' gal te tshul khrims srungs pa dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / 'bras bu rnam par sbyind pa'i bar du mi wA na/ sbyin pa byin par myi 'gyur ro// gal de sbyin pa ma byin na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
207b5(1): pa yongs su rdzogs par gyi 'drangs / sbyin pa'i pha rol su phyid pa yong slu ba rdzogs na/ blan byed 'de dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi byu 'o// rigs kyi na min she me / kye zhig dug 'das pags sa mas/ phaca
207b6(1): spyi de'i gnyen gshes de'i dug 'das gsal zhing bde bar 'a bya ba'i phyir smanapa mkhas pa bos nas drug 'da' phyung ba las myi de 'di skadaces zer ro// re shig kho bo'i lus la ma reg par snod gcig
207b7(1): bdag gi drug 'da' 'di gang phyogs nas 'ongs sus blangs/ rgyal rin sam bram ze 'am/ rigs ngan gyis blangs samagar las 'ongs pa rgyug nye bya'o// yang 'da' nyid shing ngam smra
207b8(1): ma'am 'on te lung ma 'am/ med la'u nyid kyang sus brdungs/ rno bo lcags sam/ mnyen lpags sam/ mda' sgo nyid kyang bya ci zhig gi sgo/ bya rgod dam byan lang gi sgro 'am/ dug nyid kyang g.yas brung
207b9(1): sum byas pa zhig/ 'on te rang 'byung ba zhig gam/ 'on te byis byas pa'i chug gam 'on sbrub gdug pa'i dug yin nas/ de skar glen pas brtags kyang / rtogs par ma gyur da te/ de ma thag tu che smos so// 
207b10(1): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal yang de dang 'braste// sbyin pa byin na bye brag tu rnam par 'byed de/ 'di ni pa sbyin pa lend po'o// 'di ni tshul khrims bsrung ba// 'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya ba nas
208a1(1): 'bras bu'i rnam par sbyind pa'i bar du bye brag su 'byed pas nam bu yang sbyin pa byin par myi 'gyur ro// gal te sbyin pa byin pa na sbyin gI la rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par gyi 'gyur ro// gal te spyan pa'i pha rol na/ 
208a2(1): kA tu phyind pa yongs su ma rdzogs na/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myi grub bo// / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa 'aspyod pa na/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems mnyam pa ni
208a3(1): bu gcig bla 'dra bar 'du shes so// gzhan yang sbyin pa byin pa na sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa ni ji ltar pha mas bu gcig pa na pa'i nad g.yog byed pa dang 'dra'o// sbyin pa 'aspyad pa na sems rab tu dga' ba ni
208a4(1): ci ltar pha mas bu'i nang sos pa mthong ba dang 'dra'o// sbyin pa byin pas sems btang snyoms su gyur pa pa ni/ dper na pha mas bu gcig pa bskye rdzogs pa te/ shed bye nas rang thos pa mthong ba dang 'dra'o// de ltar byang chub
208a5(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyis/ kha zas/ bag sbyin pa byin pa na/ 'di ltar smon lam 'dabs ke/ bdag ni/ sbyin pa byin pa 'das sems can thams cad dang 'thun mong du gyur pa gcig/ 
208a6(1): de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis sems can thams cad kyis ye shes chen po'i zas thob cing / bla na myed pa'i theg pa chen por bsngo bar gyur da gcig/ sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i zas thob cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
208a7(1): rgyas kyis tshol bar ma gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad kyis chos kyi dge' ba'i zas thob cing 'dod pa'i zas tshol bar ma gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rald tu phyind pa'i zas thob cing / yongs
208a8(1): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa dang / thogs pa myed pa'i mchog gi dge ba'i rgyu sdud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyis stong pa nyid kyis mtshan nyid rtogs shing // thogs pa myed pa'i lus thob nas
208a9(1): nam ka lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rtag tu sbyin pa lend par 'gyur zhing thams cad la byams brtse ba dang / kun gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur cig ces spom la ma 'des so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
208a10(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyis zas sbyin pa byin na/ smon lam de dag bskyed pa la shi nang tu brtan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyis
208b1(1): bcung bag baspyod pa byin pa ni/ 'di ltar smon lam 'dres du / bdag gis basbyin pa byin pa ni// sems can thams ched dang mthun mong du gyur cig/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis sems can thams cad theg pa chen po'i chu bor 'an
208b2(1): pa dang / ro rnam pa brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i chu zung zhing myu rab tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dkod pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skom rgyas gdungs pa spong ba dang / blan byed pa'i sang sa rgyas kyi reg pas
208b3(1): gyi ngoms pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba yongs su spong zhing / rlom kyi ros kyi ngobs pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'dod pa spong zhing theg pa chen po yongs su mye ngan las 'das pa la mos pa dang / chos kyi skung yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ting nge 'dis
208b4(1): rnams thob pa dang / shi nad tu zab pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i zhugs par gyur da cig/ sems canathams can gyis bdud ci'i ro myong zhing / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i 'dod par spangs nas rab tu bde dben pa'i ro myong bar gyur cig/ 
208b5(1): sems can thams cad kyis char byed pa brgya gro snyed dang ldan par 'gyur /  zhing chos kyi ro dang ldan par gyu da nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma thod par gyur da ces/ sangs rgyas kyis rang bzhin mthong nas chos kyi cha rab tu
208b6(1): chos kyi ro gcig pa thob par gyur na cig/ sems can thams cad kyis rnam pa drug tu gyur pa'i ro ma yin pa'i dngan pa'i ro gcig pa khro'i bar gyur cig// sems can thams cad kyis chos kyi ro'abab zhig tshol shing thogs pa byed pa'i
208b7(1): sangs rgyas kyi ros 'apyod pa'i ro las ro gzhan tshol bar ma gyu dad cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyis btung ba'i skom sbyin pa byin pan/ smon lam 'di dag shi na tu brtags par bya'o// 
208b8(1): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyis theg pa'i sbyin pa byin pa na/ 'di ltar smon lam 'debs so// bdag gis sbyin pa byin pa'i de sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du gyur// / 
208b9(1): cig/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis sems can thams cad theg pa chen po rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i theg pa dang / myi g.yol ba'i theg pa dang / rdo rje btan gyi theg pa dang / nyan thos dang
209a1(1): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos pa'i theg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis theg pa la 'bab pa dang / myi 'phrogs pa'i theg pa dang / myi zhand pa'i theg pa dang phyir myi nung ba'i theg pa dang / bla na byed pa'i theg pa dang / ho bapa bcu/ 
209a2(1): 'i theg pa dang / yon tan chen po'i theg pa dang / thu rab tu byung ba'i theg pa dang / ngom tshan mo'i theg pa dang shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i theg pa dang mtha' yas pa'i thegs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pas brtag par gyur da cig/ rigs kyi bu kyang
209a3(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyis theg pa sbyin pa byin pa ma rtag tu smon lam de dag bskyed pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgo ba'i gos sbyin pa byin pa ni se la 'di ltar ljon
209a4(1): lam 'debs so// bdag gis sbyin pa byin pa 'di sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du gyur da cig/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis sems can thams cad mdzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba'i gos dang ldan zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis lus khebs nas/ ska ba mang pos klags pa'i
209a5(1): gos tral ba dang / gos kyis lus la khrul gapa ma reg par dang / gser gyi mdodag can gyis lus thob pa dang / reg bya rnams ni shi nad tu 'jam pa dang 'od gsal zhing thogs pa myed pa dang / mdog cher zhings pags pa 'jam la 'od rtag tu/ 
209a6(1): byed pa dang / gzugs med byed cing gzugs dang bral shing bar gyur da cig/ sems cas thams cad kyis gzugs myed pa'i lus thob cing // gzugs/ thams cad las 'das pa dang // gzugs byed pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa/ na
209a7(1): chen po la zhugs par gyur da cig ces smon lam 'debs so// rigs kyi bu byed chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gos kyis sbyin pa byin pa na/ de ltar smon lam skyed pa la brtan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub / 
209a8(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bsgos n+de/ mye tog dang / drug spos dang spos kyi phye ma dang / gsung can sbyin pa byin bI tshe/ 'di skar smon lam 'debs so// bdag gis sbyin pa byin pa ni/ sems can thams cad dang yun mong du
209a9(1): cig/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas su tu mar ting nge 'dzind thob cing / byang chub kyi/ yan lan bdun gyi cod pan mgo la thogs par shog shig/ sems can thams cad gzugs zla ba nya dang 'dra bar gyur cig/ 
209a10(1): mthong ba'i gzugs thams cad phul du gyur par shog shig/ sems can thams cad kyis mtshan gcig pa'i bsod nams brgyas pa yongs su brgyan par shog shig/ sems can thams cad kyis yid bzhin du 'ong ba'i gzugs
209b1(1): mthong bas shon sho// sems can thams cad kyis btags pa shes dang dran cing jogs pa skyed pa'i gzung pob nas/ byi gcar ba gang rnams dang bral bar shog shig/ sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na myed pa na po melta bu dang
209b2(1): ldan zhi byer shog shig/ sems can thams cad kyis gcig la gcig mthong ba tsam gyis dga' zhing 'ja' rlung // bsdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i mya ngan myed pa dang / so so dge ba dang ldan zhing gcig la gcig myi gnod par shog shig/ 
209b3(1): sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi gsung dang ldan par shog shig/ sems can thams cad thogs pa myed pa'i tshul khrims bsrung zhing / de'i dri gsung gis phyogs bcur ma dad par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad shind tu brtan pa'i tshul khrims dang
209b4(1): pa byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / thams cad mkhye nad pa'i ye shes kyis 'a tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su spong ba'i tshul khrims dang / thams cad myed pa'i tshul khrims dang / sngon ma byung ba'i tshul khrims dang / mkhan po myed pa
209b5(1): 'i tshul khrims dang / bya ba myed pa'i tshul khrims dang / gdung ba myed pa'i/ tshul khrims dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa'i tshul khrims dang / mthar phyind pa'i khrims dang / mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang/ ldan pa spos kyis
209b6(1): 'di' gus lus la byug pa dang / mtshon gyi 'debs shing 'dzugs pa la mnyamabar byams sdang myed par shog shig/ sems can thams cad bla na mye pa'i tshul khrims thob pa dang / theg pa chung ngu'i tshul khrims ma yin pa theg pa chen
209b7(1): po'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa par shog shig/ sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis spund kyis grub pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par shog shig/ sems can thams cad
209b8(1): sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / bcom 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang shes rab la goms par shog shig/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i pad mo dang ldan zhing pad mo'i dri gsung
209b9(1): gis phyogs bcur yongs su ma dad par shog shig/ sems can thams cad theg pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bla na myed pa'i zas gsung can dang ldan zhing ji ltar gsungs pa dag me tog gi kha dog gsung la myi gnod pa ltar shog
209b10(1): shig/ sems can thams cad yon tan tshad myed pa las grub pa'i lus dang ldan par shog shig/ ces smon lam 'debs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa'i sems kyis me tog dang spos kyis
210a1(1): sbyin pa byin pa na/ rtag tu smon lam 'di dag gdab pa brtan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyis khri btan dang / gding ba sbyin pa byin pa ma
210a2(1): 'di ltar smon lam 'debs so// bdag gyis sbyin pa byin pa 'di sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du gyur cig/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis sems can thams cad lha'i sgra nyal pa'i khri dang ldan par gyur cig shes rab chen po dang ldan ning
210a3(1): bsam btan bzhi' gnas la 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyal ba'i khri gtan la nyal ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi khri hanas myi nyes pa dang / ngan pas nyal ba'i khri btan yongs su spong bar shog shog
210a4(1): sems can thams cad shi nad tu pad par nyal zhing / bzhon pa'i bstan yongs su spangs te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i seng ge'i khri tan dang ming ldan par shog shig/ sems can thams cad khri tan de la 'dug nas
210a5(1): kyang / de ma yin pa'i sems can tshad myed pa gzhan yang mngon par shes pa seng ge rnam par shold pa mngon du pa btonod par shon ni/ ga/ sems can thams cad theg pa chen po gzhal myed khang chen po 'in
210a6(1): la gnas nas/ sems can thams cad la yang sangs rgyas kyi rang pa zhin bstond par shog shig/ sems can thams cad bla na myed pal khri stan la 'dug nas 'jig rten gyi chos kyis myi 'phrogs par shog shis
210a7(1): sems can thams cad bzod pa'i khri bsanyan thob nas// 'khor ba'i bkros grang gi mu ge las bral bar shog shig/ sems can thams cad 'jigs myed pa'i khri bas tan thob nas/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad spong bar shog
210a8(1): shig/ sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa'i khri bas nad thob nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dapa' shig la brtson par shog shig/ sems can thams cad dge' ba la gnas pa'i khri bstan po thob nas
210a9(1): rtag tu dge' ba'i gshes gnyen gyis skyob par shog shig/ sems can thams cad glo g.yas pas nyam pa'i khri ba nyan thob nas pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdzad pa'i chos la gnas par shog shig/ ces smon lam 'debs so// 
210a10(1): rigs kyi bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar byams pa'i sems kyis khri btan dang / gding pa smin pa byin pa na/ de ltar smon lam btab pa la brtan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
210b1(1): byin pa ni/ 'di ltar smon lam 'debs so// bdag gis sbyin pa byin pa 'dis sems can thams cad mthun mong du gyur cig/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis sems can thams cad theg pa chen po'i khang par gnas shing // dge ba'i bshes
210b2(1): gnyen dag 'apyod pa la nan tan daspyod pa dang // snying rje chen po la nan tan byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug la nan tan du pyod pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa la dpyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams can
210b3(1): gyis dpyod pa'i lam la dpyod pa dang / nam ka ltar mtha' yas shing rgya che ba la dpyod par shog shig/ sems can thams cad yang dag par dran pa dang ldan zhing ngan par rtog pa yongs su spong bar shog shig/ sems can thams cad brtag pa dang
210b4(1): bdel sa dang bdag dang yongs su dag pa la bde bar gnas shing phyin gyi log bzhi yongs su spong bar shog shig/ sems can thams cad 'jigarten las 'das pa'i ye shes dang 'bru 'dzind par shog shig dang / sems can
210b5(1): sa ca byed pa mas ca shigang /  ma ldan pa'i 'as 'dug dang/ shog she/ mas rdzog sa das
210b6(1): kyis rtag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i khang par zhugs par sho ga shig/ sems can thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa'igazhal myed / khang du rtag tu gnas par shog shig/ ces smon lam 'debs
210b7(1): so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa'i sems kyis gnas khang khang khyim sbyin pa byin pa na/ rtag tu smon lam 'di dag bskyed ma la brtang par bya'o// rigs kyis bu gzhan yang byang chu
210b8(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyis mar mye'i snang ba sprin byin pa ma/ 'di ltar smon lam 'de bas so// bdag gis sbyin pa byin pa ni sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du gyur da cig/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis
210b9(1): sems can thams cad chad myed pa'i 'od dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par shog shig/ sems can thams cad rtag tu snang bas kun tu gsal bar shog shig/ sems can thams cad mdog dam pa dang ldan te/ phul tu gyur
211a1(1): pa'i mdog 'tsher ba dang ldan par shog shegs/ sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i myig dang ldan te/ mdongs pa'i rab rib kyis su ma 'chod par gyu shigasems can thams cad mkhyen dpa
211a2(1): 'i ye shes kyis sgom dang ldan te/ bdag myed pa dang sems can myed pa dang gang zag myed pa dang / srog myed pa la shin de tu mazhes par shog shig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag pa la rnam
211a3(1): mkha' lta bur mthong bar shog shig/ sems can thams cad shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i sha'i dbyig dang ldan te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gda' ga'i bye ma snyed kyang gsal bar mthong bar shog shig/ sems cad thams chags sa
211a4(1): rgyas kyi 'od dang ldan te phyogs bcur snang bar shog shig/ sems can thog ma myed pa'i dbyig dang ldan te/ thams cad kyis sangs rgyasas kyis rang bzhin yongs su dag pa mthong bar shog shig/ sems can thos
211a5(1): cad ye shes chen po'i bsnang ba thob cing mun pa thams cad dang / log sreg thams cad bcom par shog shig/ sems can thams / tshad myed pa'i 'od dang ldan zhing tshad myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin kun tu
211a6(1): snang par shog shig/ sems can thams cad theg pa chen po'i sgron ma 'tshugs shing theg pa chung cu gnyis kyi sgron ma spong bar shog/ shig/ sems can thams cad snang ba'i 'od dang ldan zhing ma rig pa'i
211a7(1): mun pa gsal nas/ nyi ma tod pas kyang lhag pa'i kun tu snang ba'i yon tan dang ldan par shog shig/ sems can thams cad mye'i 'od kyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i snang ba thob nas/ tod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
211a8(1): khams kyi mun nag thams cad gsal bar shog shig/ sems can thams cad sargyan lnga dang ldan te chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang / bsnyon pa myi dgongs par rang rang kyi rtogs par shog shig/ sems can thams cad ma rig pa myi
211a9(1): lta bar shog shig/ sems can thams cad theg pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'od zer gyis/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang dag par gartonod par shog shig ces smon sa ma med pas so// rigs kyi bu
211a10(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems kyis kye'i snang ba sbyin pa byin pa na / rtag tu smon lam 'di dag skyed pa la brtan par bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas
211b1(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ba'i gzhi ni byams pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sems le nan tan byed pa na/ tshad myed pa'i dge bal rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro// 
211b2(1): 'di lta ste myi sdug pa la rtog pa pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du smra bar 'grang ba dang / myi rtag pa dang / skye ba dang / 'gog pa dang / dran par nye khA bzhag pa bzhi dang / thabs mkhas pa bdun dang / stong pa'i gnas gsum dang
211b3(1): rten cing 'brel dbar bcu gnyis dang / bdag myed pas sogs pa rtog pa dang / drod dang spyi bo dang / bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog gi chos dang / mthong ba'i lam dang/ bsgom pa'i lam das/ yang dag par spong ba
211b4(1): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / rnam par mthadad pa brgyad pa dang
211b5(1): mngon par shes pa garnanas dang thog ma myed pa'i mtha' shes pa'i ye shes dang // nyan thos kyis ye shes dang / rang sangs rgyas tu / ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang / zas rgyag
211b6(1): kyi ye shes la sogs pa chos de dag thams cad kyi bzhir 'gyur ba ni byas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de bas na byams pa'i yayang dag pa'i bden pa si brdzun pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu jis te gcig gis dge ba'i rtsa
211b7(1): ba thams cad kyi gzhing 'gyur ba gang yin no// zhes 'drin byams pa yin no zhes kyis shig/ de bas na yang dag pa ste/ brdzun pa ma yin no// / rigs kyi bu dag dge bar 'gyur mi yang dag par ga/ sems pa'o// yang
211b8(1): dag par sems dpa' ni byams pa'o// byams pa ni de gshegs pa'o// byams pa ni theg pa chen po'o// theg pa chen po ni byams pa'o// byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni byang chub kyis tshe
211b9(1): byang chub kyi lam ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni byams pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams ni tshangs pa chen po'o// tshangs pa chen po ni byams pa'o// 9/ byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// 
212a1(1): rigs kyi bu byams pa ni sems can thams cad kyi pha ma lta bul yin no// pha ma ni byams pa'o// byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni bsam gyis myi rgyal po// snam gyis myi
212a2(1): khyab pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni byams pa'o// de bas na byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin par rigs par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyams pa ni sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no// de star sa
212a3(1): rgyas kyi rang bzhin de yang yun ring po nas nyon mongs pas zild kyi gnan te/ bsgribs pas sems can rnams kyis ma mthong ngo // de ltar sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni byams pa'o// byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu
212a4(1): byams pa ni stong pa' chen po'o// stong pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'o//  byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni nam mkha'o// nam mkha' ni byams pa'o// byams la ni de bzhin gshegs
212a5(1): pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni rtag pa'o// rtag pa ni chos so// chos ni dge 'dun no// dge bdun ni byams pa'o// byams pa/ ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni bde ba'o// 
212a6(1): bde ba ni chos so// chos ni dge 'dun no// dge 'dun ni byams pa'o byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni yongs su dag pa'o// yongs su dag ni chos so// chos ni dge 'dun no/ 
212a7(1): dge 'dun mi byams pa'o// byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni bdag ces bya'o// bdag ni chos so// chos ni dge 'dun no// dge 'dun ni byams pa'o// byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// 
212a8(1): rigs kyi bu byams pa ni bdud rtsi'o// brgyad chi ni byams pa'o// byams pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no// sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni chos so// chos ni dge 'dun mo// dge 'dun ni byams pa'o// byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs
212a9(1): pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bla na myed pa'i byang chub bo// byang chub ni byams pa'o// byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams ca
212a10(1): kyi tshad myed pa'i dpyod yul lo// tshad myed pa'i spyod yul lo byams pa'o// de bse na byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni myi rtag pa'o// myi rtag pa ni byams pa'o// byams pa 'di ni
212b1(1): ni nyar thos kyi byams pa yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni de sdug bsngal yin na// ba sdug bsngal ni byams pa yinono// / de bas nabyams pa 'di ni nyan thos kyi byams pa yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu
212b2(1): byams pa ni yongs su ma dag pa yin na/ yongs su dag pa ni byams pa'o// de bas na byams pa de ni nyan thos kyi byams pa yin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni bdag myed pa yin no// bdag myed pa ni byams pa'o// de bas ma byas
212b3(1): ba de ni nyan thos kyi byam la pa'o// / rigs kyi bu byams pa ni myi bden pa'o// myi 'den pa ni byams pa'o// byams pa ni nyan thos kyi byams pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi rang pa ma yin na// sbyin pa'i byabs pa par yin te/ 
212b4(1): byabs pa de ni nyan thos kyi byams pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'ar du yang de bzhin du 'argyas par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa gang zhig sems can la phan gyi thogs na// byams pa de ni nyan thos kyi byams pa'o// 
212b5(1): rigs kyi bu byabs pa gang zhig mtshan nyid gcig pa'i lab las zhugs na byams pa de ni nyan thos kyi byangs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa gang zhig chos thams cad mngon par martogs na// byams pa deni nyan thos kyi
212b6(1): rgyam bar min par byo/ rigs kyi du byabs pa ga zhin de bzhin gan/ gas pa'i snying po kyi mthong sabyams la don nyam chos kyi byams/ pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa gang zhig thams cad yod pa'i mtshan
212b7(1): du ma mthong / byabs pa de ni nyan thos kyi byams pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'i ste byams pa gang zag dang bcas na zag pa dang bcas pa de ni nyan thos kyi byams pa'o// rigs kyi bu ci he byams pa 'dus byas dang bcas na 'dus
212b8(1): byab dang bcas pa'i byabs poni nyan thos kyi byams pa'o// rigs kyi bu mi nye pa dang po gyi gnas na sa dang po'i byams pa ma yin te/ deni nyan thos kyi byangs par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu ci ste byams pas sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang / 
212b9(1): gyi 'jigs pa bzhi'athob par gyi nusate/ byabs pa de ni nyan thos kyi byams pa yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa gang zhig dge sbyong gi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'i byams pa de'i nyan thos kyi byams pa yin par rig par byan
212b10(1): rigs kyi du byabs pa gang zhig yod pa dang myed pa dang // yod pa yang ma yin myed pa yang ma yin pa dang bcas pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad kyis dpag nus pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ste byams pa bsam/ 
213a1(1): gyis myi khyab na/ chos kyang bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang bsam gyis myi khyab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab bo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
213a2(1): po theg pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa ni/ byams pa de lta bu dag la nam tan byed do// gnyid kyis bde ba la gnas kyang rtag tu bcon 'grus batshon pas gnyid kyis khri lad kyis kyi non to// rtag tu mad mod kyi
213a3(1): gnyid myed pa'i phyir pad pa yang yod do// gnyid kyi nang na lha rnams yongs su srung mod kyi/ sdig pa myi spyod pas na srung yang myed do// gnyid dang yongs su bral bas rmyi lam ngan pa 'am myi dge bar 'gyur ba yang yang myed do// rigs
213a4(1): chas pa'i lhar skyes mod kyi dbang du gyu rad pas skyes pa yang byed do// rigs kyi bu gang byams pa la nan tan byed pa de ni lha'i yom ta ma tshad myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu yongs su mya ngang las 'dra/ 
213a5(1): pa'i mdo sde dam pa 'di yang de lta bu'i yon tan tshad myed pa bsam gyi myi// khyab pa dang ldan no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta/ bu'i yon tan chad myed pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa/ 
213a6(1): 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ci tsam yid la bgyidapa de dag thams cad yang dag pa bden galag pa la nyan thos dang rang sangs

213b3(1): pa byod pa nye lan par gyi 'gyur ba yangs yod // rigs kyi bu da ni byams pa de sa rnam pa ched byed par bshad do// rigs kyi bu 'di na ste 'angon par shes pa dag go// rigs kyi phu dper nas sbyin gyis rgyas po

214a5(1): ma 'ong de dag gnas bu song ba 'am// phyag gi zis g.yas par gzhag pa/ 'am/ zhib mor byas ga'am/ byi gong dru pa rmongs pa yang byed thod kyi/ rigs kyi bu de yang byams pa'i mthul las ni/ kyang mas phyis
214a6(1): dngos po de lta bu dag mthong bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang phyogs pe ta la'i yul na grong khyer chen po shu pa la zhes bya ba na/ khyi bdag 'dod pa zhes bya ba sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas chad myed pa snyed/ 
214a7(1): la dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa / 'gro ba med po'i tshe sngor gyu rad pa zhig yod do// rigs kyi bu grong khyer chen po de na gnas pa'i myi thams cad mu stegs can la phyogs to// gcer bu dag gi g.yog byed do// de'i tshe de'i dus ma khyim bdag de 'dul
214a8(1): ba'i phyir rgyal po'i'akhab nas grong khyer der gshegs mar chas so// de'i bar na dpag chad drug bcu rtsa lnga zhig yod de// de na gnas pa'i sems tsam 'dul ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te gom pas ral gyis gshegs so// 
214a9(1): de'i tshe grong khyer shu la la zhes bya yan/ gnas mi'i gcer bu pa rnamasas nas thos nas/ de gas sems kyi 'di snyam du bsams su tu // gce bu pa rnams sa sa 'a ba kras te / grong khyer de na gnas pa'i phyinamapa pa na ma parnam/ 
214a10(1): dge sbyong 'go Sh+ya tam zhes bya ba de 'dipa'ong zhes grag gis/ dge sbyong de ni ya dpa ma yang spa pa nas gang yang rgyu zhing 'gro ste/ gang nas gang tu byinang pa'i gnas pa'i de dang de dag tu lo nyes pa dang bu ge 'byung bar byed/ nad ma pa
214a11(1): sa to des sbyong dge tu ta ma 'dir 'ongs ma/ 'di na gnas pa thams cad bdag gcag kyang spong zhing yo byad kyang kyi sde dad te/ dbul phongs par 'gyur na/ bdag gcag ma tsho bar 'gyur snyam bsams nas// 
214b1(1): 'chi ba mang par byed de// de las tha rad pa myed do// dge sbyong 'go'u tam ma rungs pa de ni 'khor yang srin po yi dgas ma tshungs pa sha satag khrid ci ba'ong de la ni ya yang myed ma yang byed de dbul phongs pas ched pu khror 'dod pa'i phyir 'ong ngo //
